examples.translation: When you walk up the ramp then you'll see my home.

senses.definition: 一本由銀行發出，俾客户睇返自己户口錢銀紀錄嘅簿；由於近年銀行服務電子化，而且好多銀行改為郵寄或電郵月結單俾客户，所以存摺已經逐漸消失（量詞：本） (passbook)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.text: 而家愈嚟愈少人用存摺㗎喇，好多人都會直接上網睇返自己嘅户口紀錄。
examples.jyutping: ji4 gaa1 jyut6 lai4 jyut6 siu2 jan4 jung6 cyun4 zip3 gaa3 laa3, hou2 do1 jan4 dou1 wui5 zik6 zip3 soeng5 mong5 tai2 faan1 zi6 gei2 ge3 wu6 hau2 gei2 luk6.
examples.translation: There are fewer people using passbooks now, most people simply check their bank account records online.

senses.definition: 表示兩者比較時，更為接受同希望採取嗰個選項；通常兩個選項都唔係太好 (would rather; prefer; when comparing two options, indicates the option that one wishes to adopt; often implies that both options are not that good)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.text: 我最憎夏天出街㗎喇，我情願留喺屋企好過。
examples.jyutping: ngo5 zeoi3 zang1 haa6 tin1 ceot1 gaai1 gaa3 laa3, ngo5 cing4 jyun2 lau4 hai2 uk1 kei2 hou2 gwo3.
examples.translation: I really hate going out in summer. I would rather stay home.

senses.definition: #識做 、#識趣 (voluntarily, willingly and quickly)
senses.label: 副詞

examples.text: 你明係鍾意個女仔㗎啦。趣趣地認咗佢啦！
examples.jyutping: nei5 ming4 hai6 zung1 ji3 go3 neoi5 zai2 gaa3 laa1. ceoi3 ceoi3 dei2 jing6 zo2 keoi5 laa1!
examples.translation: You obviously like that girl, don't you? Come on, just admit it!

senses.definition: 小小心意，或者強調自己只係付出咗少少 (merely; meagrely)

examples.text: 趣趣哋買返十蚊馬仔先。
examples.translation: I am just going to bet just 10 dollars on the horse race.

senses.definition: 用水洗某物件，令佢變得清潔乾淨 (to wash; to rinse; to clean)

examples.jyutping: cing1 sai2 jan2 jing4 ngaan5 geng2 jat1 ding6 m4 ho2 ji5 maa1 fu1
examples.translation: Contact lens cleaning must not be done carelessly.

senses.definition: 去除、清除某人或物件，一般係（被視為）唔純潔 (to get rid of someone or something which is typically (perceived to be) impure; to purge)

examples.jyutping: zung2 zuk6 cing1 sai2
examples.translation: ethnic cleansing

senses.definition: 「#出pool」嘅字面意思，指脱離單身，成功拍拖 (a direct transliteration of #出pool: to enter into a romantic relationship with somebody; to be no longer single; to start dating)
senses.label: 動詞

senses.label: 動詞

examples.jyutping: ceot1 pu1 jiu3 ceng2 sik6 faan6 hai6 soeng4 sik1 baa6.

senses.definition: 順其自然，唔使強求 (to let it be; to leave it to fate)

examples.translation: feel free to donate any amount

senses.definition: 氣象迷術語；指熱帶氣旋唔登陸菲律賓同台灣，直接橫過巴士海峽進入南海；泛指熱帶氣旋未登陸而穿越呂宋海峽 (the meteorological phenomenon of a tropical cyclone passing through the Bashi Channel i.e. the Luzon Strait without making landfall on the Philippines or Taiwan, so named due to "Bashi" and "bus" (#巴士) being homographs)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.text: 近年搞到香港掛十號嗰兩個颱風都係坐巴士入嚟㗎。

examples.translation: The two typhoons which led to Hong Kong raising a signal No. 10 in recent years both entered the South China Sea via the Bashi Channel.

examples.translation: His ambition to seize control of the company had long been clear.

examples.translation: The ten-dollar banknotes issued by this bank are green.

senses.definition: #生產，#出產；多指一個地方或機構令某人變成而家咁 (to produce; usually, a place or an institution making someone to be the way they are now)

examples.text: 呢間大學近幾年出咗幾個有名嘅數學家。
examples.jyutping: ni1 gaan1 daai6 hok6 gan6 gei2 nin4 ceot1 zo2 gei2 go3 jau5 ming4 ge3 sou3 hok6 gaa1.
examples.translation: This university has produced a number of well-known mathematicians in the past few years.

senses.definition: #生長；#出現 (to grow; to appear)

examples.jyutping: ceot1 can2
examples.translation: to develop rash

senses.definition: #提供、俾 (to offer; to give; to provide)

examples.jyutping: jau5 cin2 ceot1 cin2, jau5 lik6 ceot1 lik6
examples.translation: Those who have money, offer money; those who can work, offer to work. (meaning, to offer what you can for the cause)

senses.definition: #買，通常用嚟講自己買咗部新車或者新嘅手提電話 (to buy, especially a car or a mobile phone)

examples.jyutping: ceot1 gei1
examples.translation: to buy a phone

senses.definition: 超過，通常都係連埋個「不」字一齊用；見 #不出 ((used only in the negative) to exceed; to go beyond; see #不出)

examples.text: 佢咁勤力，我諗佢不出三個月一定會寫完本書。
examples.jyutping: keoi5 gam3 kan4 lik6, ngo5 nam2 keoi5 bat1 ceot1 saam1 go3 jyut6 jat1 ding6 wui5 se2 jyun4 bun2 syu1.
examples.translation: He is so hardworking that I think he will definitely finish his book within three months.

senses.definition: #使用、帶出、#展示 (to use; to bring out; to show)

examples.jyutping: ceot1 ziu1
examples.translation: to take (drastic) action

senses.definition: 喺香港指總重量24噸至30噸嘅#貨車，車長8.3米以上 (heavy goods vehicle)
senses.label: 名詞

senses.definition: #輪迴 之前嘅上一次、上一期人生；上世 (past life)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.text: 我懷疑你前世欠咗我，唔係做咩對我咁好？
examples.jyutping: ngo5 waai4 ji4 nei5 cin4 sai3 him3 zo2 ngo5, m4 hai6 zou6 me1 deoi3 ngo5 gam3 hou2?
examples.translation: I wonder if you owed me in the past life, is it now your payback time?

senses.definition: #前世冇修 嘅縮略，指上一世嘅罪孽；經常用嚟做歎詞 (sin from one's past life; abbreviation of #前世冇修 cin4sai3 mou5 sau1; usually used as an interjection)

examples.jyutping: zan1 hai6 cin4 sai3 lo3!
examples.translation: This is so low!

senses.definition: 專指#汽車（量詞：架／部） (car; automobile)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.jyutping: keoi5 maai5 zo2 gaa3 ce1.
examples.translation: He's bought a car.

senses.definition: 泛指陸上交通工具（量詞：架／班） (land vehicles in general)

examples.jyutping: nei5 nam2 zyu6 daap3 me1 ce1 faan1 heoi3?
examples.translation: What means of transportation are you thinking of taking to get back?

senses.definition: 駕駛技術（量詞：手） (driving skill)

examples.jyutping: keoi5 sau2 ce1 hou2 laat6.
examples.translation: His driving skill kills.

senses.definition: 快速#送貨 或者送信嘅服務 (express delivery; courier)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.jyutping: cuk1 dai6 gung1 si1
examples.translation: express delivery company

senses.definition: 形容物件或者地方散發難聞嘅氣味，甚至令人唔舒服 (smelly; stinking; foul; odorous)
senses.label: 形容詞

examples.text: 你個身好臭啊，快啲去沖個涼啦。
examples.jyutping: nei5 go3 san1 hou2 cau3 aa3, faai3 di1 heoi3 cung1 go3 loeng4 laa1.
examples.translation: You really stink! Go to take a shower right now.

senses.definition: 脾氣差 ((of a temper) bad; fierce)

examples.jyutping: cau3 pei4 hei3
examples.translation: bad temper

senses.definition: 賭場入面由賭場發出嘅、用以代替現金作為賭注嘅用品（量詞：個） (casino token; gaming chips)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.text: 左頌星一口氣推晒所有籌碼出去，佢又曬冷喇！
examples.jyutping: zo2 zung6 sing1 jat1 hau2 hei3 teoi1 saai3 so2 jau5 cau4 maa5 ceot1 heoi3, keoi5 jau6 saai3 laang1 laa3!
examples.translation: Chor Chung Sing has yet again pushed all his chips out to the table. It's another all-in for him!

senses.definition: 談判交易時，參與者擁有嘅優勢或利益，運用嚟令自己喺當中有更大嘅力量同收穫 (stake; bargaining chip; bargaining power)

examples.text: 佢哋有咁多籌碼喺手，要透過談判爭取返我哋嘅利益恐怕都唔係咁易。
examples.jyutping: keoi5 dei6 jau5 gam3 do1 cau4 maa5 hai2 sau2, jiu3 tau3 gwo3 taam4 pun3 zang1 ceoi2 faan1 ngo5 dei6 ge3 lei6 jik1 hung2 paa3 dou1 m4 hai6 gam3 ji6.
examples.translation: As they have so much leverage, it might be very difficult for us to negotiate our rightful interests.

senses.definition: 用嚟量度距離嘅工具嘅統稱；大概可以分做軟同硬兩類，各自有唔同嘅設計同形狀，而硬身嘅又可以用嚟幫手劃唔同嘅圖形（量詞：把） (ruler)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.jyutping: gaan3 cek2
examples.translation: ruler

senses.definition: 引伸指人要嚟量度人或者事物嘅標準（量詞：把） (metaphorically refers to the standard in someone's mind)

examples.text: 佢可能喺你嘅標準嚟講係okay嘅，但係用我把尺嘅話就真係唔得囉。
examples.jyutping: keoi5 ho2 nang4 hai2 nei5 ge3 biu1 zeon2 lei4 gong2 hai6 ou1 kei1 ge3, daan6 hai6 jung6 ngo5 baa2 cek3 ge3 waa2 zau6 zan1 hai6 m4 dak1 lo1.
examples.translation: He may meet your standards, but he definitely doesn't meet mine.

senses.definition: 形容人好多嘢講、好#長氣，係噉重覆，令人煩厭 (talking about something over and over again, in a tedious and tiresome manner)
senses.label: 形容詞

examples.text: 唔好咁唚氣啦，我知點做㗎喇。
examples.jyutping: m4 hou2 gam3 cam3 hei3 laa1, ngo5 zi1 dim2 zou6 gaa3 laa3.
examples.translation: Don't keep repeating yourself; I know what to do.

senses.definition: 成日同人一齊、上人屋企，攞人着數、等人請自己食飯飲嘢 (to be a "sponge"; to hang out with someone or frequently go to someone's place to benefit from others' generosity, especially for food and drinks; literally, stick drink stick food)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.text: 你細佬成日喺度黐飲黐食都唔係辦法。
examples.jyutping: nei5 sai3 lou2 seng4 jat6 hai2 dou6 ci1 jam2 ci1 sik6 dou1 m4 hai6 baan6 faat3.
examples.translation: Your younger brother always stays at our place and sponges off us. We need to do something.

senses.definition: 好快咁超過咗一個規限、目標 (to break through; to breach)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.text: 幾經辛苦，我軍終於衝破敵軍嘅首度防線。
examples.jyutping: gei2 ging1 san1 fu2, ngo5 gwan1 zung1 jyu1 cung1 po3 dik6 gwan1 ge3 sau2 dou6 fong4 sin3.
examples.translation: After much hardship, our army finally broke through the enemy's first line of defense.

senses.definition: 騙子；呃人錢、以 #拆白 為生嘅人（量詞：個/班） (swindler)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.jyutping: caak3 baak6 dong2 sei2 fei1 zai2
examples.translation: swindler and gangster

senses.definition: 透過一啲象徵式嘅動作嚟搶佔地盤 (to claim territory via symbolic means; literally: to plant flag)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.text: 佢帶住班馬去咗佢仇家間酒吧度插旗。
examples.translation: He led his gang to his rival's bar to mark their turf.

senses.definition: 市儈、斤斤計較、唔夠大方 (miserly; cheapskate; scrouge)
senses.label: 形容詞

examples.text: 我公司真係好鬼cheap，叫我去上海出trip，但係唔包保險！
examples.jyutping: ngo5 gung1 si1 zan1 hai6 hou2 gwai2 cip1, giu3 ngo5 heoi3 soeng6 hoi2 ceot1 cwip1, daan6 hai6 m4 baau1 bou2 him2!
examples.translation: My company is cheap! They asked me to go on a business trip to Shanghai but didn't cover my insurance.

senses.definition: 形容失去本身有嘅尊嚴或價值 (to lower oneself in terms of respect; to demean oneself)

examples.jyutping: neoi5 zeoi1 naam4 hai6 mai6 hou2 cip1?
examples.translation: Do you think women are lowering their worth by chasing after men?

senses.definition: 冇價值，低俗；尤其至關於品味嘅嘢 (inferior; vulgar; low quality; lowbred; especially regarding issues of style or taste)

examples.text: 呢隻香水牌子聞落似消毒藥水，仲要係膠樽裝，真係cheap到十蚊店都唔賣囉。
examples.jyutping: ni1 zek3 hoeng1 seoi2 paai4 zi2 man4 lok6 ci5 siu1 duk6 joek6 seoi2, zung6 jiu3 hai6 gaau1 zeon1 zong1, zan1 hai6 cip1 dou3 sap6 man1 dim3 dou1 m4 maai6 lo1.
examples.translation: This perfume has a disinfectant-like scent and comes in plastic bottles, even discount stores wouldn't sell such a low-quality product.

senses.definition: 形容價格平，唔貴（由於 "cheap" 經常用嚟鬧人，為免誤會，通常表達「唔貴」嘅意思嗰陣都會避開用呢個詞） (inexpensive; affordably priced (the use of this sense is usually avoided because "cheap" has negative connotations))

phonetic.original: ceoi4 hau2 ngap1 dong3 bei3 kap1
jyutping: ceoi4 hau2 ngap1 dong3 bei3 kap1

senses.definition: 形容啲人講到自己係專家噉，其實只不過係亂咁講 (to bullshit as if one is the expert; to speak from one's ass; literally, casual words taken as the bible)
senses.label: 語句

examples.text: 佢乜都唔識，就喺度隨口噏當秘笈。
examples.jyutping: keoi5 mat1 dou1 m4 sik1, zau6 hai2 dou6 ceoi4 hau2 ngap1 dong3 bei3 kap1.
examples.translation: He knows absolutely nothing and he's speaking nonsense.

keywords: ceoi4 hau2 ngap1 dong3 bei3 kap1
ceoi hau ngap dong bei kap

senses.definition: 加插喺影視節目、廣播劇、舞台戲劇中間嘅歌曲（量詞：首） (interlude; songs in films, dramas or animations)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.text: 呢齣話劇安排咗好多小插曲。
examples.jyutping: ni1 ceot1 waa2 kek6 on1 paai4 zo2 hou2 do1 siu2 caap3 kuk1.
examples.translation: This play features many side plots.

senses.definition: 一啲阻滯，令一件事唔可以順暢發生嘅事故（量詞：段） (a small event or interlude, to prevent a whole event from running smoothly)

examples.text: 佢哋相識嘅過程有好多插曲。
examples.jyutping: keoi5 dei6 soeng1 sik1 ge3 gwo3 cing4 jau5 hou2 do1 caap3 kuk1.
examples.translation: There were many unexpected twists and turn of events when they first met.

senses.definition: 睇唔起；#鄙視；#不屑 (to scoff at; to look down on something; to turn one's nose up)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.text: 阿業對阿強嘅所作所為嗤之以鼻。
examples.jyutping: aa3 jip6 deoi3 aa3 koeng4 ge3 so2 zok3 so2 wai4 ci1 zi1 ji5 bei6.
examples.translation: Ah-yip looks down on what Ah-keung did.

senses.definition: 扯低人哋，#夾硬 拉人哋落一盤爛攤子入面，明明唔係某人嘅錯都要牽連到佢 (to ruin someone; to bring someone down, to involve someone who is supposed not the one to blame for into an event; literally: to drag someone down to water)
senses.label: 語句

examples.text: 嗱，你死你事，你唔好扯埋我落水。
examples.jyutping: laa4, nei5 sei2 nei5 si6, nei5 m4 hou2 ce2 maai4 ngo5 lok6 seoi2.
examples.translation: It's not my fault, it's your problem. Don't drag me into this.

senses.definition: 一種烹調方法。將材料放喺滾水快煮之後撈出。通#燙、#焯 (to blanch)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.text: 雪藏肉最好汆吓水，去咗雪味先煮。
examples.jyutping: syut3 cong4 juk6 zeoi3 hou2 ceot1 haa5 seoi2, heoi3 zo2 syut3 mei6 sin1 zyu2.
examples.translation: It's best to blanch frozen food briefly in water to remove any freezer odor before cooking.

senses.definition: 將一啲花插落去個花樽度，可以作為一種手工藝 (floral arrangement)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.jyutping: keoi5 zeoi3 gan6 hok6 gan2 caap3 faa1.
examples.translation: She's learning how to arrange flowers these days.

senses.definition: 指胯下運球，一種籃球運球技巧，經兩腿之間彈地傳波俾另外一隻手以改變方向 (Between-the-Legs Crossover, a basketball dribbling technique to change directions by bounce-pass the ball between the legs to another hand)

examples.text: 高比呢下插花認真靚呀，成功呃過守衞再鏟籃入波，好嘢！
examples.translation: Kobe pulled off a fantastic between-the-legs move, faked the guard, and scored a layup - spectacular!

senses.definition: #足球 員將自己嘅腳喺#波 上面兜 ((football) step over)

examples.text: 朗拿度插幾下花就過晒後衞仲射入埋。
examples.translation: Ronaldo dribbled through defence and scored.

senses.definition: 作品出版成書 (to have works published as a book)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.text: 而家出書話都冇咁易啦。
examples.jyutping: ji4 gaa1 ceot1 syu1 waa6 dou1 mou5 gam3 ji6 laa1.
examples.translation: Publishing a book is not as difficult as it used to be.

senses.definition: 用快速嘅水流嚟#清潔、洗刷一啲嘢 (to rinse; to flush)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.jyutping: cung1 ci3 so2
examples.translation: to flush the toilet

senses.definition: 被水撞擊或捲走 (to be washed away by water)

examples.text: 有一條海豚俾浪沖咗上岸。
examples.jyutping: jau5 jat1 tiu4 hoi2 tyun4 bei2 long6 cung1 zo2 soeng5 ngon6.
examples.translation: A dolphin was washed ashore by the waves.

senses.definition: 製作一啲要用水開嘅飲品 (to make a drink by pouring water onto concentrated substance such as tea leaves, coffee beans, milk powder, concentrated juice, etc.)

examples.jyutping: cung1 gaa3 fe1
examples.translation: to make coffee

senses.definition: #沖曬；而家多數只係專指沖曬裏面，用顯影藥水沖洗菲林嘅過程 ((of photography) to develop)

examples.jyutping: zing3 cung1 fu6
examples.translation: cross-processing positive color reversal film in C-41 chemicals

senses.definition: 指一個動作嘅方向係由接近聽者到遠離聽者並接近講者；同 #入嚟 唔同嘅係，出去通常用於講者認為較寬廣、較外圍或較唔偏僻嘅地方 (out; to indicate that an action is done in a direction away from the hearer and nearer to the speaker. The difference between 出嚟 ceot1 lai4 and #入嚟 jap6 lai4 is that the former usually refers to somewhere the speaker considers as wider, farther, or less remote.)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.jyutping: ling1 ceot1 lei4
examples.translation: to take something out

senses.definition: 加喺動詞後面，指動作嘅方向由近到遠、由裏到外 (out; outside (which also has the connotation of going downtown))
senses.label: 動詞

examples.jyutping: bun1 ceot1 heoi3
examples.translation: to move out

senses.definition: 離開身處嘅地方，轉移到外面嘅、寬廣啲嘅另一個空間 (to go out; to go to a farther place; to leave a place)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.text: 唔該你出去，唔好煩住我。
examples.jyutping: m4 goi1 nei5 ceot1 heoi3, m4 hou2 faan4 zyu6 ngo5.
examples.translation: Please go out and don't bother me.

senses.definition: 去冇咁偏僻嘅地方，例如市中心 (to go downtown)

examples.jyutping: gam1 maan5 ceot1 heoi3 sik6 faan6 lo3.
examples.translation: Let's dine out tonight.

senses.definition: 暫時離開咗通常喺嘅地方 (to leave temporarily)

examples.text: 佢出咗去冇咁快返，不如你係度坐低等下先？
examples.jyutping: keoi5 ceot1 zo2 heoi3 mou5 gam3 faai3 faan1, bat1 jyu4 nei5 hai6 dou6 co5 dai1 dang2 haa6 sin1?
examples.translation: He's not coming back anytime soon. Why don't you just sit here and wait for a while?

senses.definition: #才能 同埋#智慧 嘅簡稱 (ability and wisdom)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.text: 做得香江四大才子一定有返咁上下才智。
examples.jyutping: zou6 dak1 hoeng1 gong1 sei3 daai6 coi4 zi2 jat1 ding6 jau5 faan1 gam3 soeng6 haa2 coi4 zi3
examples.translation: Being Hong Kong's four great talents means having certain abilities and wisdom

senses.definition: 擁有好多#車 嘅#隊伍，可以係賽車、貨車、公共交通等 (fleet)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.translation: Taxi fleet

senses.definition: 好多部#車 一齊行駛嘅#隊伍 (motorcade; convoy)

examples.text: 警方護送國家主席車隊
examples.translation: Police escorting the motorcade of the head of state.

senses.definition: 表示贊同、嘉許同讚揚 (to show approval; to praise; to commend; to encourage somebody, usually for their good deeds or job well done)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.text: 多啲稱讚人，自己都會開心啲。
examples.jyutping: do1 di1 cing1 zaan3 jan4, zi6 gei2 dou1 wui5 hoi1 sam1 di1.
examples.translation: Praising others can make you happier.

senses.definition: 未有內容 NO DATA
除此以外；引出另外連帶嘅項目 (besides; moreover)
senses.label: 連詞

examples.text: 今次兩國總統會面會討論雙邊關係，此外兩人亦會就環保問題交換意見。
examples.jyutping: gam1 ci3 loeng5 gwok3 zung2 tung2 wui6 min6 wui5 tou2 leon6 soeng1 bin1 gwaan1 hai6, ci2 ngoi6 loeng5 jan4 jik6 wui5 zau6 waan4 bou2 man6 tai4 gaau1 wun6 ji3 gin3.
examples.translation: In this meeting, the two presidents will discuss bilateral relations. Moreover, they will exchange their views on environmental protection as well.

senses.definition: 麻雀術語，打出咗人哋叫緊糊嗰隻牌，令佢可以食糊 ((mahjong terminology) to discard a tile that others are calling)
senses.label: 動詞

senses.definition: 起稿；起一個初步版本作為大概構思 (draft)
senses.label: 語素

examples.jyutping: hei2 cou2
examples.translation: to draft

senses.definition: 唔認真；求其；馬虎 (careless; sloppy)

examples.jyutping: cou2 seot1
examples.translation: careless; sloppy; perfunctory

senses.definition: 一種手寫字體風格，比較冇咁#工整 (cursive)

examples.jyutping: cou2 syu1
examples.translation: cursive script

senses.definition: 香港小食，包住一條#腸仔 嘅麪包（量詞：個／隻） (sausage bun)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.text: 佢日日早餐都會食一個腸仔包。
examples.jyutping: keoi5 jat6 jat6 zou2 caan1 dou1 wui5 sik6 jat1 go3 coeng2 zai2 baau1.
examples.translation: Every day, he eats a sausage bun for breakfast.

senses.definition: 一種#情緒 病；#患者 會喺唔同時候經歷#亢奮 期同#抑鬱 期兩極，又叫「雙相情感障礙」或者「雙極情緒失調症」 (bipolar affective disorder)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.text: 我哥哥有躁鬱症，要食穩定情緒嘅藥。
examples.jyutping: ngo5 go4 go1 jau5 cou3 wat1 zing3, jiu3 sik6 wan2 ding6 cing4 seoi5 ge3 joek6.
examples.translation: My elder brother suffers from bipolar disorder, and has to take mood stabilisers.

senses.definition: 香港歷史最悠久、住院病牀最多嘅#精神科 專科#醫院，位於#屯門 (Castle Peak Hospital)
senses.label: 名詞

senses.definition: 香港山峯名；位於新界#屯門 區嘅一座山，海拔583米 (Castle Peak; literally "green hill")
senses.label: 名詞

senses.definition: #青山醫院 嘅簡稱 (abbreviation of Castle Peak Hospital, a psychiatric hospital with the longest history in Hong Kong)

examples.jyutping: zoi3 cou4 zau6 sung3 nei5 jap6 cing1 saan1
examples.translation: If you dare be noisy again, I will send you to Castle Peak Hospital!

senses.definition: #屯門 區嘅舊名；接管#新界 初期，香港政府將成個區命名為「青山」，直到1971年先起用返「屯門」呢個古名 (Castle Peak, the old name of Tuen Mun)
#牌照 持有人（量詞：個） (licensee; license holder)

senses.definition: 插喺褒義或含肯定義嘅形容詞、動詞第一個音節之後，用嚟表達反面嘅意思 (affixed to negate any adjective or verb with a positive or affirmative connotation, after its first syllable; "not ... at all"; "extremely not")

senses.definition: #出面，通常係幫人 (to appear personally; to act in one's own capacity, usually using their social status to facilitate something)

examples.translation: He's clumsy, so asking him to do delicate work is out of the question.

examples.jyutping: nei5 hau4 lung4 m4 syu1 fuk6 aa4? baa2 seng1 hou2 caak3 bo3.
examples.translation: Do you have a sore throat? Your voice sounds very hoarse.

examples.translation: Can I join in your game?

senses.definition: 指踢足球或者打手球嗰陣，明明好易入波，但係踢/掟得太高而射失；亦都有「抽高氣爽」呢個叫法 ((of mainly football or handball) to shoot over the crossbar, particularly when missing an easy goal; literally: "to fry an airplane")

examples.text: 個波喺正龍門前面你都可以炒飛機嘅！你識唔識踢㗎？
examples.jyutping: go3 bo1 hai2 zeng3 lung4 mun4 cin4 min6 nei5 dou1 ho2 ji5 caau2 fei1 gei1 ge3! nei5 sik1 m4 sik1 tek3 gaa3?
examples.translation: You sent the ball over the crossbar even though it was right in front of the goal! Do you know how to play football?

senses.definition: 用手抽起，拎起一樣嘢 (to lift up; to grab; to pull)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.jyutping: cing3 keoi5 hei2 san1.
examples.translation: Pull him up.

examples.translation: to exploit something until depletion

examples.jyutping: nei5 dang2 ngo5 coe2 dim6 loeng5 pin1 pei1 paa4 sin1, ting1 jat6 jiu3 gaau1 aa3.
examples.translation: Can you let me finish my two papers - they're due tomorrow.

senses.definition: 不斷問人嘢、要人幫自己做嘢 (to bombard someone with questions or requests)

examples.text: 今日老細全日喺度chur我，我連飯都未有得食呀！
examples.jyutping: gam1 jat6 lou5 sai3 cyun4 jat6 hai2 dou6 coe2 ngo5, ngo5 lin4 faan6 dou1 mei6 jau5 dak1 sik6 aa3!
examples.translation: My boss kept bombarding me with requests. I don't even have time for lunch!

senses.definition: 食煙、吸毒嗰陣大啖吸氣 (to take a pull (of cigarette, weed, etc.); to inhale during smoking)

examples.jyutping: coe2 faan1 daam6 jin1 sin1 laa1!
examples.translation: Let's have a cigarette first!

senses.definition: 適合草木生長嘅和風同埋雨水，後來比喻師長和藹親切嘅教育 (amiable education provided by teachers or seniors; literally: wind and rain that is suitable and favourable for the growth of plants)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.text: 喺良師嘅春風化雨之下，學生可以喺輕鬆嘅環境下學習知識。
examples.jyutping: hai2 loeng4 si1 ge3 ceon1 fung1 faa3 jyu5 zi1 haa6, hok6 saang1 ho2 ji5 hai2 hing1 sung1 ge3 waan4 ging2 haa6 hok6 zaap6 zi1 sik1.
examples.translation: Under the nurturing guidance of great teachers, students can learn in a relaxed environment.

senses.definition: 負責處理現金收支嘅職員，例如喺銀行負責櫃位嘅職員 (teller)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.text: 做出納員每日都要經手好多錢，其實都好大壓力。
examples.translation: The teller handles a lot of money every day. It's is quite a stressful job.

senses.definition: #時髦、跟上#潮 流 (trendy; fashionable)

examples.translation: Why are you dressed so fashionably today?

senses.definition: #風騷；舉止輕佻 (coquettish; to be frivolous)

examples.text: 睇佢個樣咁潮氣，唔通有喜事？
examples.translation: He looks so frivolous, may be he has something good happened?

senses.definition: 指拳頭嘅瞬間#爆發力，或指用瞬間#爆發力 打出嘅拳，起手動作小但力量大 (the explosiveness emerge from small movement of body or jab; to punch using a short jab with explosiveness on arm and fist,  the pull back and preparation movement is very small. Literally:inch power)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.text: #詠春 係講求短橋寸勁，唔係大開大合。
examples.translation: Wing Chun relies on short arm movements and explosive power, not wide open postures.

senses.definition: 歌頌傳揚 (to be widely spread)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.text: 名留青史嘅英雄會畀人傳誦。
examples.jyutping: ming4 lau4 cing1 si2 ge3 jing1 hung4 wui5 bei2 jan4 cyun4 zung6.
examples.translation: The names of renowned heroes will be eternally celebrated.

senses.definition: 收錄嘅#詞語 同埋佢嘅解釋（量詞：條） (entry of a lexicon)

examples.text: 呢條詞條寫到噉嘅樣，執下佢啦。

examples.translation: The way this entry is written is a bit strange, it needs to be fixed.

senses.definition: 攪亂、破壞一件事 (to mess up or damage something)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.text: 原本個企劃好地地嘅，依家你一隻腳䟕埋嚟扠喎晒喇！
examples.jyutping: jyun4 bun2 go3 kei5 waak6 hou2 dei6 dei6 ge3, ji1 gaa1 nei5 jat1 zek3 goek3 caa1 maai4 lai4 caa5 wo5 saai3 laa3!
examples.translation: The project was going well until you interfered and ruined it.

senses.definition: 未來揾錢嘅機會 (chance of earning money in future)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.text: 讀多啲書揾份好工，包你錢途一片光明
examples.jyutping: duk6 do1 di1 syu1 wan2 fan6 hou2 gung1 ，baau1 nei5 cin2 tou4 jat1 pin3 gwong1 ming4
examples.translation: Read more books and get a good job. I assure you will find success.

senses.definition: 形容啲野皺皺地嘅、有好多摺痕 (crumpled)

senses.definition: 向下望到嘅距離短 (shallow)

senses.definition: 形容#顏色 嘅一個特徵 ((of colour) light; pale)

senses.definition: 無難度；簡單 (easy; simple)

examples.jyutping: mui5 fung4 dung1 tin1, ngo5 di1 tung4 hok6 dou1 ceng2 ngo5 sik6 dung3 gam1, taam1 ngo5 gau3 nyun5.
examples.translation: During winter, my classmates often put their cold hands on my face because I'm warm enough.

senses.definition: 即係#巢；有摺痕，表面唔平滑嘅 (wrinkled; creased; crinkled)

examples.translation: This shirt is so wrinkled, how am I supposed to wear it?

senses.definition: 將一啲長條形或者薄、幼嘅嘢放入某物入面 ((of strip-like or thin objects) to insert; to thrust; to put in; to stick in)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.text: 佢將啲玫瑰插咗落個花樽度。
examples.jyutping: keoi5 zoeng1 di1 mui4 gwai3 caap3 zo2 lok6 go3 faa1 zeon1 dou6.

senses.definition: 加入其中 (to insert; to add; to place between; to join)

examples.translation: to insert or add new content into the existing arrangement, rundown, etc.

senses.definition: 批評；指責；鬧 (to reprimand; to scold; to admonish; to chastize)

examples.jyutping: ngo5 fan6 bou3 gou3 m4 hai6 se2 dak1 gei2 hou2, ting1 jat6 hoi1 wui2 ge3 si4 hau6 sat6 bei2 lou5 sai3 caap3 dou3 fei1 hei2.
examples.translation: My report is not very well-written. I'm definitely going to get a scolding from my boss at tomorrow's meeting.

senses.definition: 價格跌；#插水 (to drop in price)

examples.jyutping: go3 gu2 si5 jau6 caap3 laa1
examples.translation: The stock market drops again!

senses.definition: 黑幫幫會首領 ("lodge leader"; traid boss; traid leader; leadership rank in the contemporary simplified hierarchy of most Hong Kong triad groups)
senses.label: 名詞

senses.definition: #控制 唔到自己，係咁#諗 住或者#做 一樣嘢。 (to be addicted to; to (destructively) lose oneself in something.)
senses.label: 動詞

senses.definition: #長做 嘅#散工；工時唔長但係有穩定返工時數嘅兼職（量詞：份／個） (long-term temporary job or staff)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.text: 做幾份長散，收入加埋同一份正職差唔多。
examples.jyutping: zou6 gei2 fan6 coeng4 saan2, sau1 jap6 gaa1 maai4 tung4 jat1 fan6 zing3 zik1 caa1 m4 do1.
examples.translation: Having several part-time jobs in the long-term can yield a similar income to a full-time job.

senses.definition: 出生喺有錢人家嘅女性（量詞：個） (lady from a rich or affluent family)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.text: 人哋千金小姐嚟㗎，點會肯做呢啲粗重嘢呀？
examples.jyutping: jan4 dei6 cin1 gam1 siu2 ze2 lei4 gaa3, dim2 wui5 hang2 zou6 ni1 di1 cou1 cung5 je5 aa3?
examples.translation: She's a lady from a wealthy family, she wouldn't deign to do such laborious work.

senses.definition: 臭味；通常指#體臭（量詞：#埲／#浸） (stench; usually body odour)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.jyutping: lou5 jan4 ceoi4
examples.translation: old person smell

senses.definition: 指眼前人言行失常、精神有異；「青山」指香港最大嘅精神科醫院#青山醫院 (means someone here is insane; literally, a patient escaped from Castle Peak (a psychiatric hospital in Hong Kong))
senses.label: 語句

examples.text: 好心少少事就咪大吵大鬧啦，一陣隔籬屋以為青山走犯呀。
examples.translation: Please, don't make a big fuss over such a small matter; otherwise, the neighbors might assume someone from an asylum has escaped.

senses.definition: 命令人哋離開，語氣強烈，語調負面 (to order someone to leave, in an imperative and often disapproving manner; "get lost!")
senses.label: 語句

examples.text: 你食我嘅，住我嘅；你再唔畀翻個錢我，你就扯罷啦你！
examples.jyutping: nei5 sik6 ngo5 ge3, zyu6 ngo5 ge3, nei5 zoi3 m4 bei2 faan1 go3 cin4 ngo5, nei5 zau6 ce2 baa2 laa1 nei5!
examples.translation: I pay for your food and rent; if you refuse to pay me back, get lost!

senses.definition: 指啲人個樣睇落奸奸地或者鬼鬼祟祟，成個賊咁 (used to describe a person who looks like a thief; evil-looking)
senses.label: 語句

examples.text: 𨋢入面個人賊眉賊眼噉，我都係等第二架𨋢嚹。
examples.jyutping: lip1 jap6 min6 go3 jan2 caak6 mei4 caak6 ngaan5 gam2, ngo5 dou1 hai6 dang2 dai6 ji6 gaa3 lip1 laa3
examples.translation: The man in the lift appears suspicious, so I'll take the next one.

senses.definition: 將商品、貨物運畀客户；#送貨 (to deliver goods)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.text: 落咗單咁耐都未出貨嘅？係咪漏單呀？
examples.translation: My order hasn't been delivered for a long time. Perhaps they missed it?

senses.definition: #賣 (to sell)

examples.text: 啲財演又出口術幫隻細價股出貨啦。
examples.translation: The financial influencer used deceptive tactics to unload the penny stock.

senses.definition: 攀附人哋 (to fawn over somebody; to make up to somebody)

examples.jyutping: wai6 zo2 gwo3 dou2 ce1 ci2 ge3 saang1 wut6, keoi5 ning4 jyun2 ci1 gam1 hong1.
examples.translation: In order to live a luxurious life, he prefers associating with wealthy people.

senses.definition: 以上下嚟分隔嘅空間，每一個分隔咗嘅部分為之一層 (storey; floor; level, deck)

examples.jyutping: soeng1 cang4 baa1 si2
examples.translation: double-decker bus

senses.definition: #住宅#單位 嘅量詞 (the measure word for an apartment or flat; when used this way, it usually does not refer to the whole floor of a building, but rather only a single apartment unit)

examples.jyutping: keoi5 soeng6 go3 jyut6 zoeng1 cang4 lau2 maai6 zo2.
examples.translation: She sold her flat last month.

senses.definition: 形容一啲物質佈滿物件嘅表層 (layer; level)

examples.jyutping: zoeng1 toi2 pou1 zo2 jat1 cang4 fui1.
examples.translation: The desk is covered with a layer of dust.

senses.definition: 諗法、方案等抽象思想嘅量詞 (measure word for intangible thoughts)

examples.text: 同佢結婚嘅話我就要同阿爸阿媽斷絕關係，呢層我諗咗好耐。
examples.jyutping: tung4 keoi5 git3 fan1 ge3 waa2 ngo5 zau6 jiu3 tung4 aa3 baa4 aa3 maa1 tyun5 zyut6 gwaan1 hai6, ni1 cang4 ngo5 nam2 zo2 hou2 noi6.
examples.translation: To marry him, I would have to disown my parents; this is something that I have given much thought.

senses.definition: 出於癡迷嘅愛意；癡情嘅心意 (infatuation)

examples.text: 念在我對你一片癡心，你就嫁俾我啦！
examples.jyutping: nim6 zoi6 ngo5 deoi3 nei5 jat1 pin3 ci1 sam1, nei5 zau6 gaa3 bei2 ngo5 laa1!

senses.definition: 一幅#牆壁 下面，近住地下嘅部份 (the foot of a wall)

examples.jyutping: go3 caap3 sou1 wai2 hai2 coeng4 goek3.
examples.translation: The socket is near the base of the wall.

senses.definition: （人手、成本）減少 ((of manpower, cost) to cut; to reduce)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.jyutping: coi4 gaam2 hoi1 zi1
examples.translation: to cut down on expenditure

senses.definition: 騎馬奔跑 (gallop)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.translation: wild horses galloping

senses.definition: 在某個領域發揮才能 (to show talent in a field)

examples.translation: He has played for top-tier football teams around the world.

senses.definition: 透過擦拭，令鞋面光潔亮麗 (to shine shoes; to polish shoes)

examples.text: 佢用咗隻好高級嘅鞋油，擦到對鞋令一令。
examples.jyutping: keoi5 jung6 zo2 zek3 hou2 gou1 kap1 ge3 haai4 jau2, caat3 dou3 deoi3 haai4 ling3 jat1 ling3.

senses.definition: （正式場合）講一種語言、口音 ((formal) to speak a language or an accent)

examples.jyutping: ji4 faan2 wai4 zung1 gwok3 zik6 naam4 zi2, cou1 lau4 lei6 pou2 tung1 waa2.

senses.definition: 將貨物由#貨櫃 度搬出嚟 (devanning)

senses.definition: 一般指食嘅意思，引申為佔有、或與某人發生性關係等；正音讀啄doek3，但港式用法唔會咁讀 (to eat; extended meaning: to occupy, or to have sex with somebody)

senses.definition: 完全咁拆開（某件物件）；係一種非正式嘅講法。 (Literally, "to disassemble the skeleton"; It is an informal way to say "to totally disassemble (an object)".)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.text: 尋日我將我架車拆咗骨。幾千件零件家陣收埋咗喺車房度。
examples.jyutping: cam4 jat6 ngo5 zoeng1 ngo5 gaa3 ce1 caak3 zo2 gwat1. gei2 cin1 gin6 ling4 gin2 gaa1 zan2 sau1 maai4 zo2 hai2 ce1 fong4 dou6.
examples.translation: Yesterday, I totally disassembled my car. Thousands of its pieces are now hidden in the garage.

senses.definition: 嚴重咁殘害（某個人嘅）身體；係一種非正式嘅講法。 (Literally, "to disassemble the skeleton"; It is an informal way to say "to severely harm someone (physically)".)

examples.jyutping: ngo5 zang1 aa3 cung4 zang1 dou3 soeng2 caak3 keoi5 gwat1.

examples.text: 如果佢快過我出招，我就會輸。
examples.translation: If he executes his move faster than me, I'll lose.

senses.definition: #長短週 制嘅一部分，係#星期六 要返工、返學嘅一個禮拜 (short weekend, referring to shift plans; literally "long week")

senses.definition: 尖鋭鋒利；易傷手 (thorny)

examples.jyutping: siu2 sam1 lau4 lin4 caam5 sau2.

senses.definition: 難解決 (troublesome, hard to deal with, or difficult to accept)

examples.jyutping: nei1 daan1 gun1 si1 jeng4 min2 dai1, gei2 caam5 sau2.

senses.definition: 講嘅嘢同之前嘅話題完全扯唔上關係 (talking about a totally unrelated topic)

senses.definition: #毆打；#打敗 (to beat up; to defeat)

examples.translation: to defeat him

senses.definition: 發生性行為；帶有征服、支配意味 (to have sex with; implies domination and control)

senses.definition: #誣蔑；參見#砌生豬肉。 (to set someone up; originates from #砌生豬肉)

examples.jyutping: m4 gwaan1 keoi5 si6 gaa3, keoi5 bei2 jan4 cai3 gaa3 zaa3.
examples.translation: He has nothing to do with it. Someone set him up.

phonetic.original: caa1 zek3 goek3 maai4 lai4:caa1 zek3 goek3 maai4 lei4

senses.definition: #插手 (to interrupt; to meddle)

senses.definition: 原本指喺趁住墟期去行#市集，後來泛指一切#湊熱鬧 嘅行為 (to hang out at the market town in the "market opening period"; figuratively, to join in the fun)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.text: 新一年嘅花市啱啱開始咗，又係時候去趁下墟買下花咁喇。
examples.jyutping: san1 jat1 nin4 ge3 faa1 si5 ngaam1 ngaam1 hoi1 ci2 zo2, jau6 hai6 si4 hau6 heoi3 can3 haa5 heoi1 maai5 haa5 faa1 gam2 laa3.
examples.translation: The new year's flower market has just started, time to go check it out and buy some flowers.

senses.definition: #粗魯#野蠻，令人覺得佢#低級。 (Barbaric, unsophisticated.)
senses.label: 形容詞

examples.text: 阿松佢講親嘢都係#粗口，真係好鬼粗野。
examples.jyutping: aa3 cung4 keoi5 gong2 can1 je5 dou1 hai6 cou1 hau2, zan1 hai6 hou2 gwai2 cou1 je5.
examples.translation: A-chung uses curse words frequently. Such a crude and unsophisticated person.

senses.definition: 冇乜組織過噉#撈 埋、混合 (to mix; to combine without much organisation)
senses.label: 語句

examples.text: 佢份計劃書做得好差，淨係將以前用過嘅#橋 炒埋一碟。
examples.jyutping: keoi5 fan6 gai3 waak6 syu1 zou6 dak1 hou2 caa1, zing6 hai6 zoeng1 ji5 cin4 jung6 gwo3 ge3 kiu2 caau2 maai4 jat1 dip6.
examples.translation: His proposal was of poor quality, it was simply a rehash of old ideas.

senses.definition: 運用一啲#邪惡 超自然力量嘅#法術 (Literally "evil art", mostly referring to "sorcery, magick".)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.text: 阿松佢揾咗啲蛇皮返嚟，話要用邪術咒阿明喎。
examples.jyutping: aa3 cung4 keoi5 wan2 zo2 di1 se4 pei4 faan1 lai4, waa6 jiu3 jung6 ce4 seot6 zau3 aa3 ming4 wo3.
examples.translation: A-chung got himself some snake skin and claimed he would use black magic to curse A-ming.

senses.definition: 不停被指使、勞役或任意對待 (to treat a person in whatever way one likes; literally: to roll into a ball, to squash and flatten)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.text: 佢俾條女搓圓撳扁都冇投訴，睇嚟佢哋應該打風都打唔甩。
examples.jyutping: keoi5 bei2 tiu4 neoi2 co1 jyun4 gam6 bin2 dou1 mou5 tau4 sou3, tai2 lai4 keoi5 dei6 jing1 goi1 daa2 fung1 dou1 daa2 m4 lat1.
examples.translation: He has complaint towards his girlfriend no matter what she does. They seem inseparable.

senses.definition: 事物未定型或初步形成時嘅形態 (the first form of something/prototype)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.text: 呢個只不過係發達大計嘅雛形，好快你就會知會有幾揾得。
examples.translation: This is just a rough sketch of my profit-making plan; soon you will know how profitable it can be.

senses.definition: 慢慢咁、一步一步咁行；左步為#彳，右步為亍，合彳亍為行 (to walk slowly, step by step. 彳is the left step, 亍 is the right step, which form 行 "walk" when combined)
senses.label: 動詞

senses.definition: 行吓停吓、或者原地踏步，引伸比喻人#猶豫不決 (to walk with pauses, or to pace back and forth; figuratively, to vacilate over a decision)
將散件拼湊、組合成一個整體 (to build; to put together; to assemble)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.jyutping: cai3 zik1 muk6
examples.translation: to build blocks

senses.definition: 解決問題；#拆 (to solve problems; to figure out)

日文「刺身（さしみ）」嘅直譯，即係將生肉切片嘅料理 （量詞：件／塊） (loanword from Japanese さしみ (sashimi); thinly sliced raw seafood or meat)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.text: 日本除咗有魚嘅刺身，仲有馬肉刺身。
examples.jyutping: jat6 bun2 ceoi4 zo2 jau5 jyu2 ge3 ci3 san1, zung6 jau5 maa5 juk6 ci3 san1.
examples.translation: In Japan, they don't just have fish sashimi; they also have ones made with horsemeat.

senses.definition: 物理學#槓桿 原理中加咗重物嘅一點 (resistance; load)
senses.label: 名詞

senses.definition: 自己做錯嘢，但假扮同其他人一齊合作揾做錯嘢嘅人 (a thief posing as judge; a thief crying "stop thief")
senses.label: 語句

examples.text: 你唔好再賊喊捉賊，我有證據證明係你偷咗小明部手機。
examples.jyutping: nei5 m4 hou2 zoi3 caak3 haam3 zuk1 caak2, ngo5 jau5 zing3 geoi3 zing3 ming4 hai6 nei5 tau1 zo2 siu2 ming4 bou6 sau2 gei1.
examples.translation: Don't cry foul. You're not innocent. I have proof that you stole Siu Ming's phone.

senses.definition: 指受災害嚴重影響地區 (serious disaster area)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.text: 前往地震重災區嘅道路損毀嚴重，救援物資只靠直升機運送。
examples.jyutping: cin4 wong5 dei6 zan3 cung5 zoi1 keoi1 ge3 dou6 lou6 syun2 wai2 jim4 zung6, gau3 wun4 mat6 zi1 zi2 kaau3 zik6 sing1 gei1 wan6 sung3.
examples.translation: The road to the earthquake-stricken area was severely damaged. Relief supplies could only be delivered by helicopter.

senses.definition: 指受負面消息、事情嚴重影響到嘅嘢 (something that is seriously impacted by a negative trend or event)

examples.text: 句法成份嘅概念可謂重災區。
examples.jyutping: geoi3 faat3 sing4 fan6 ge3 koi3 nim6 ho2 wai6 cung5 zoi1 keoi1.
examples.translation: [ChatGPT]The concept of grammatical elements is a disaster area.

senses.definition: #聞 (to sniff; to smell)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.jyutping: sam1 jau5 maang5 fu2, sai3 cau3 coeng4 mei4.
examples.translation: In me the tiger sniffs the rose

senses.definition: #黑色 嘅#頭髮，多數用喺古文詞語 (black hair)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.jyutping: jat6 tau4 cing1 si1
examples.translation: a full head of black hair

senses.definition: 藍色 (blue)
senses.label: 語素

examples.jyutping: cing1 tin1
examples.translation: blue sky

senses.definition: 黑色 (black)

examples.jyutping: cing1 si1
examples.translation: black hair

senses.definition: 一種喺#枱 上面用#棍 控制#波 嘅運動、比賽，有好多種唔同玩法，常見有#英式桌球／#士碌架 同美式桌球 (billiard sports, including snooker, pool, billiards etc)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.jyutping: daa2 coek3 kau4
examples.translation: to play snooker

senses.definition: 光鮮嘅青色、綠色 (lime green; light green; yellowish green)
senses.label: 形容詞

examples.jyutping: ngo5 bou6 din6 waa2 ceng1 bi1 bi1, hou2 ji6 jing6 gaa3.
examples.translation: My phone has a lime green color; it's easy to recognize.

senses.definition: 用髮鏟將頭髮剃到好短，見到頭皮上嘅髮根 (buzz cut; to use hair clipper to shave the hair to very short, up to the hair roots)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.text: 呢期興剷青，個個剷到陸軍裝噉。
examples.jyutping: ni1 kei4 hing1 caan2 ceng1, go3 go3 caan2 dou3 luk6 gwan1 zong1 gam2.
examples.translation: The buzz cut has been quite trendy recently; everybody's sporting a military cut.

senses.definition: 好似#茶 咁嘅黃褐色；帶有少量#綠色 嘅深#啡色 (tawny in colour; dark brown)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.text: 好多女仔都中意染啲頭髮做茶色，因為明亮得嚟好自然。
examples.jyutping: hou2 do1 neoi5 zai2 dou1 zung1 ji3 jim5 di1 tau4 faat3 zou6 caa4 sik1, jan1 wai4 ming4 loeng6 dak1 lai4 hou2 zi6 jin4.
examples.translation: Many girls love to dye their hair dark brown, as it looks bright and natural as well.

senses.definition: 帶少少#黃 嘅#綠色 (grassy green)
senses.label: 名詞

senses.definition: 形容介乎#紅 同#黃 嘅顏色，即係同名水果嘅顏色 (orange colour)
senses.label: 形容詞

examples.jyutping: caang2 hung4
examples.translation: orange red

senses.definition: 顏色；#紅 同#黃 相加而成嘅顏色；#橙 嘅顏色 (orange (colour))
senses.label: 名詞

examples.jyutping: sam1 caang2 sik1
examples.translation: deep orange in colour

senses.definition: 顏色；介乎#綠 同#黃 之間嘅顏色，例如青蘋果、青提子嘅顏色 (yellowish green (colour))
senses.label: 名詞

examples.text: 青色嘅蘋果好酸，用嚟做甜品就最啱。
examples.jyutping: ceng1 sik1 ge3 ping4 gwo2 hou2 syun1, jung6 lai4 zou6 tim4 ban2 zau6 zeoi3 ngaam1.
examples.translation: Green apples are sour and best for making desserts.

senses.definition: （飲品）加水或者其他淡味嘅飲品去稀釋、溝淡濃味嘅飲品 ((of drinks) to water something down; to dilute)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.text: 啲茶太濃嚹，加啲水沖淡啲先飲啦。
examples.jyutping: di1 caa4 taai3 nung4 laa3, gaa1 di1 seoi2 cung1 taam5 di1 sin1 jam2 laa1.
examples.translation: The tea is too strong. Mix some water to dilute it before drinking.

senses.definition: （影響）用其他嘢作為手段去減輕其他事件嘅影響 ((of effects, impact) to weaken; to play down)

examples.text: 時間耐咗，件事就會沖淡架嚹。
examples.jyutping: si4 gaan3 noi6 zo2, gin6 si6 zau6 wui5 cung1 taam5 gaa3 laa3.
examples.translation: As time goes by, the incident would be forgotten.

senses.definition: #暗瘡（量詞:粒） (pimple; spot; acne)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.jyutping: ceot1 zo2 jat1 lap1 cing1 ceon1 dau2
examples.translation: a pimple developed

senses.definition: 一種花卉，屬常綠灌木或喬木 (camellia japonica)
senses.label: 名詞

senses.definition: 小學嘅校本評核，所得嘅成績會俾中學#收生 嘅時候作為參考，亦會影響#統一派位 嘅次序 (Internal Assessments (for Secondary School Places Allocation))
senses.label: 名詞

examples.text: 呈分試考唔好，你就等讀屋村學校啦。
examples.translation: If you are not doing well in the internal assessments test, you will be allocated to schools that have poor learning atmosphere.

senses.definition: 鼻孔外露，就好似#插蘇 嘅兩個窿 (short nose)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.text: 佢未整容之前係插蘇鼻。
examples.jyutping: keoi5 mei6 zing2 jung4 zi1 cin4 hai6 caap3 sou1 bei6.
examples.translation: She had a short nose before the plastic surgery.

senses.definition: #又、#同、#並 (and, also)
senses.label: 語素

examples.jyutping: ji4 ce2
examples.translation: also

senses.definition: 暫時 (temporary)

examples.jyutping: ce2 maan6
examples.translation: wait a moment

senses.definition: 仲係；都已經 (still; already)

examples.jyutping: soeng6 ce2
examples.translation: still; already

senses.definition: 一種利用滑板喺海浪上面滑行嘅水上運動 (to surf; surfing)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.jyutping: haa6 jat6 cung1 long6
examples.translation: x

senses.definition: 一種常見鳥類，分佈喺南亞、東南亞，叫聲類似豬叫同屎喳聲 (Oriental magpie-robin; Copsychus saularis)
senses.label: 名詞

senses.definition: 行為或者講嘢唔正常、有問題、唔合乎邏輯嘅女性；#黐線 嘅女人（量詞：個） (insane woman)
senses.label: 名詞

senses.definition: 一個根據物理計算得出可連接唔同空間、時間嘅概念結構 (wormhole, a theoritical conceptual connection between points in space-time)
senses.label: 名詞

senses.definition: 腳放喺界線上面，掂到條界 (to step on the boundary line)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.jyutping: keoi5 caai2 zo2 gaai3, ni1 kau4 gaai3 ngoi6 kau4.
examples.translation: He stepped on the touchline; there will be a throw-in.

senses.definition: 比喻瀕臨越規；做法有爭議；幾乎過咗位 (to enter the grey area; literally: to trample on the line or boundary)

examples.text: 幅相咁暴露，喺公司睇有啲踩界。
examples.jyutping: fuk1 soeng2 gam3 bou6 lou6, hai2 gung1 si1 tai2 jau5 di1 caai2 gaai3.
examples.translation: This photo is so revealing that it's almost not safe for work.

senses.definition: 走去另一範疇 (to overstep the boundary; to enter a different domain)

examples.text: 好多歌星都踩過界做埋電影。
examples.jyutping: hou2 do1 go1 sing1 dou1 caai2 gwo3 gaai3 zou6 maai4 din6 jing2.
examples.translation: Many singers also get into the movie industry.

senses.definition: 向各方大眾收集 (to collect, to raise and gather, esp. capital)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.jyutping: cau4 zaap6 zi1 gam1
examples.translation: to raise funds

senses.definition: （同某樣嘢）分開 (to dissociate; to detach (emotionally from something))
senses.label: 動詞

examples.text: 阿明喺上次套戲演咗個男主角之後就抽離唔到。
examples.jyutping: aa3 ming4 hai2 soeng6 ci3 tou3 hei3 jin2 zo2 go3 naam4 zyu2 gok3 zi1 hau6 zau6 cau1 lei4 m4 dou2.
examples.translation: A-ming has been unable to detach himself from the male lead since he played that character in the last movie.

senses.definition: 用#內窺鏡 檢查#大腸 嘅醫療程序 (colonoscopy; lower endoscopy)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.jyutping: ziu3 coeng2 geng3/ zou6 coeng2 geng3
examples.translation: to have a colonscopy done

senses.definition: 僅餘；淨低；冇清除乾淨而留低落嚟嘅少量 (only remaining; left over; the little amount left over when something is not thoroughly removed)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.text: 網上書店同連鎖書店盛行，只有少數小書店能夠殘存落嚟。
examples.jyutping: mong5 soeng6 syu1 dim3 tung4 lin4 so2 syu1 dim3 sing6 hang4, zi2 jau5 siu2 sou3 siu2 syu1 dim3 nang4 gau3 caan4 cyun4 lok6 lai4.
examples.translation: Online bookstores and chain bookstores are very popular, that only a few small bookshops can survive.

senses.definition: #錯誤#配搭 (to mismatch)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.text: 資源錯配係佢哋公司一個嚴重嘅問題。
examples.jyutping: zi1 jyun4 co3 pui3 hai6 keoi5 dei6 gung1 si1 jat1 go3 jim4 zung6 ge3 man6 tai4.
examples.translation: The inappropriate allocation of resources is a severe problem in their company.

senses.definition: 特價 (a very low price)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.text: 年尾通常啲舖頭會出超筍價嚟吸引客人。
examples.jyutping: nin4 mei5 tung1 soeng4 di1 pou3 tau2 wui5 ceot1 ciu1 seon2 gaa3 lei4 kap1 jan5 haak3 jan4.
examples.translation: The store would have goods at very low prices to draw people's attention at the end of the year.

senses.definition: 粗糙低劣；品質差 (shoddy; poor quality)
senses.label: 形容詞

examples.jyutping: cou1 lyut6 ge3 sik6 mat6
examples.translation: poor quality food

senses.definition: 數唔完嘅困難、痛苦 (countless hardships; to spare no pains)
senses.label: 語句

examples.text: 經歷千辛萬苦，醫療界終於揾到對抗愛滋病嘅新療法。
examples.jyutping: ging1 lik6 cin1 san1 maan6 fu2, ji1 liu4 gaai3 zung1 jyu1 wan2 dou2 deoi3 kong3 oi3 zi1 beng6 ge3 san1 liu4 faat3.
examples.translation: After innumerable trials and tribulations, the medical arena has finally found a new treatment against AIDS.

senses.definition: （紀錄）開創；建立 ((of a record) to create, to establish, to set a new record)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.text: 我今年去咗七次旅行，幫自己創下一個新紀錄。
examples.jyutping: ngo5 gam1 nin2 heoi3 zo2 cat1 ci3 leoi5 hang4, bong1 zi6 gei2 cong3 haa6 jat1 go3 san1 gei2 luk6.
examples.translation: I have set a new record for myself. I have traveled for 7 times this year.

senses.definition: 負責做一樣嘢 (to do; to handle; literally "to wield the knife")
senses.label: 動詞

examples.text: 呢單嘢等我親自操刀搞掂佢啦。
examples.jyutping: ni1 daan1 je5 dang2 ngo5 can1 zi6 cou1 dou1 gaau2 dim6 keoi5 laa1.
examples.translation: I will handle this matter myself and have it settled.

senses.definition: 唔仔細、唔謹慎；疏忽；對一啲野唔夠上心、俾唔夠注意力 (careless; neglectful; inattentive)
senses.label: 形容詞

examples.text: 你成日都咁粗心，第日點做大事啊？
examples.jyutping: nei5 sing4 jat6 dou1 gam3 cou1 sam1, dai6 jat6 dim2 zou6 daai6 si6 aa3?
examples.translation: You are always so careless and inattentive. How will you achieve something great in the future?

senses.definition: 一樣嘢嘅強弱或者水平；事情發展嘅狀況（量詞：個） (level; degree)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.text: 呢個城市嘅文化程度好高。
examples.jyutping: ni1 go3 sing4 si5 ge3 man4 faa3 cing4 dou6 hou2 gou1.
examples.translation: This city has a high degree of culture.

senses.definition: 從某個出發點去睇一件事 (extent)

examples.text: 從某程度上嚟講，佢哋噉做係啱嘅。
examples.jyutping: cung4 mau5 cing4 dou6 soeng6 lai4 gong2, keoi5 dei6 gam2 zou6 hai6 ngaam1 ge3.
examples.translation: They're right in doing that to a certain extent.

senses.definition: 長期，同投資、業務有關 ((of investments and business) long-term)
senses.label: 形容詞

examples.jyutping: coeng4 sin3 tau4 zi1
examples.translation: long-term investment

senses.definition: 用工具將血液引出體外，通常用嚟做檢驗 (to draw blood)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.text: 個病人啲血管硬晒，好難抽血喎。
examples.jyutping: go3 beng6 jan4 di1 hyut3 gun2 ngaang6 saai3, hou2 naan4 cau1 hyut3 wo3.
examples.translation: All the patient's veins are hard that it is difficult to draw blood.

senses.definition: 所述兩個人或者兩件物件嘅前一個；所述兩種情況嘅前一種 (the former (person, object or situation))
senses.label: 名詞

examples.text: 市面上嘅手機有兩個主要嘅牌子：A 同 B。前者價錢比較平，後者比較耐用。
examples.jyutping: si5 min6 soeng6 ge3 sau2 gei1 jau5 loeng5 go3 zyu2 jiu3 ge3 paai4 zi2: ei1 tung4 bi1. cin4 ze2 gaa3 cin4 bei2 gaau3 peng4, hau6 ze2 bei2 gaau3 noi6 jung6.
examples.translation: There are two main brands of cellphones in the market: A and B. The former is cheaper, the latter is more durable.

senses.definition: 即係重量訓練，指用舉重同對抗阻力嘅運動達到健身嘅效果 (weight training)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.text: 想keep好個身形，做帶氧唔夠㗎，一定要配合重訓先得。
examples.jyutping: soeng2 kip1 hou2 go3 san1 jing4, zou6 daai3 joeng5 m4 gau3 gaa3, jat1 ding6 jiu3 pui3 hap6 cung5 fan3 sin1 dak1.
examples.translation: To keep your body in a good shape, just doing aerobics is not enough. You must complement it with weight training.

senses.definition: 以前冇嘅；最近先出現、創造，或發現嘅 (completely new; all new; latest)
senses.label: 形容詞

examples.text: 呢個全新設計嘅包裝，比起以前嗰個吸引好多。
examples.jyutping: ni1 go3 cyun4 san1 cit3 gai3 ge3 baau1 zong1, bei2 hei2 ji5 cin4 go2 go3 kap1 jan5 hou2 do1.
examples.translation: This completely newly designed package is much more attractive than the old one.

senses.definition: 冇人用過嘅 (new; mint in box)

examples.text: 呢個遊戲機仲係全新㗎。
examples.jyutping: ni1 go3 jau4 hei3 gei1 zung6 hai6 cyun4 san1 gaa3.
examples.translation: This video game console is still brand new.

senses.definition: 起源自香港嘅地道大眾化食肆，主要提供西餅包點、港式西餐同飲品，亦都有家常小菜、粥粉麪飯等中式食品（量詞：間） (Hong Kong-style cafe, or cha chaan teng, a kind of affordable local restaurant originated from Hong Kong that serves bread, cake, localised western cuisine, drinks, and sometimes Chinese dishes; literally: tea restaurant)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.text: 樓下間茶餐廳啲菠蘿包好好食。
examples.jyutping: lau4 haa6 gaan1 caa4 caan1 teng1 di1 bo1 lo4 baau1 hou2 hou2 sik6.
examples.translation: The cha chaan teng downstairs serves really tasty pineapple buns.

senses.definition: #茶餐廳 嘅別稱（量詞：間） (Hong Kong-style cafe; cha chaan teng)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.text: 肚餓喇，不如食返食開嗰間茶記啦！
examples.jyutping: tou5 ngo6 laa3, bat1 jyu4 sik6 faan1 sik6 hoi1 go2 gaan1 caa4 gei3 laa1!
examples.translation: I'm hungry now. Let's go to the cha chaan teng we often visit.

senses.definition: #炒賣 帶起嘅#價格 (speculative price)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.jyutping: sik6 caau2 gaa3
examples.translation: to bear the speculative price

senses.definition: 彼此急速帶勁#碰撞 起上嚟 (to collide; to clash)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.jyutping: loeng5 gaa3 coi3 ce1 faat3 sang1 cung1 zong6.
examples.translation: [ChatGPT]Two race cars collided.

senses.definition: 得罪；冒犯 (to offend)

senses.definition: 造成嚴重影響 (to make a strong impact on something or somebody)

senses.definition: 漢字文化圈裏面，皇帝制度下嘅中央政府；或者有皇帝居住，中央政府辦公嘅主要地方（量詞：個） (an old royal government in the East Asian cultural sphere; or the palace where the King lives and the royal government operates)

Nowadays, there is no more illegal noodle wooden cart on the street, instead, cart noodles becomes a dish widely available in restaurants, with wider range of delicious toppings)

examples.text: 成日俾佢哋激，搞到我依家都燥底咗好多。

senses.label: 名詞

examples.text: 唔好做牆頭草喇！攞啲主見出嚟好冇？

senses.definition: #佛教 中指人死後#投胎 做人 (to reincarnate)

jyutping: cau3 gau3 jat1 go3 hou2 zi6

senses.definition: 指親友義務擔任#司機，係#俄羅斯 作曲家「彼得·伊里奇·柴可夫斯基」嘅縮略語，諧音「司機」 (driver or chauffeur, usually referring to a designated driver or someone who drives for family and friends; it originates from a pun of the name Tchaikovsky, as the omitted last two syllables are a homophone of #司機 (si1 gei1) "driver" in Cantonese)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.jyutping: zou6 caai4 ho2 fu1
examples.translation: to be a chauffeur, to drive (usually family and friends) home or around

senses.definition: 以某個名去提起某人或者引起佢注意、回應 (to address somebody)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.jyutping: ngo5 jing1 goi1 dim2 cing1 fu1 nei5 aa3?
examples.translation: How may I call you?

senses.definition: 叫喚或對一個人打招呼時用嘅名（量詞：個） (form of address for a person)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.jyutping: siu2 ze2, cing2 man6 dim2 cing1 fu1?
examples.translation: How should I address you, miss?

senses.definition: 顯現；展露出 (to appear; to emerge)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.jyutping: cing4 jin6 ngaan5 cin4
examples.translation: to appear in front of me

senses.definition: 時髦、流行 (trendy; avant-garde; in fashion)
senses.label: 形容詞

examples.text: 呢款手袋係今季最潮㗎。
examples.jyutping: nei1 fun2 sau2 doi2 hai6 gam1 gwai3 zeoi3 ciu4 gaa3.
examples.translation: This handbag design is in vogue this season.

senses.definition: 潮濕、受潮 (damp; moist)

examples.jyutping: di1 beng2 gon1 ciu4 zo2 hou2 naan4 sik6.
examples.translation: The damp biscuits taste awful.

senses.definition: 挖#礦物；#掘礦 (to mine for minerals)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.jyutping: coi2 kwong3 paai4 ziu3
examples.translation: mining license

senses.definition: #撩鼻屎 嘅戲稱 ((humorous) to pick one's nose)
senses.label: 動詞

senses.definition: 臘鴨腎，即係醃製風乾嘅#鴨腎 (dried duck gizzard)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.translation: congee with dried duck gizzards and cabbage

senses.definition: 行凶作惡 (to commit a violent act)
senses.label: 動詞

senses.definition: 一種鱗翅目嘅#昆蟲，成蟲有兩對翼，身上有白色鱗毛，幼蟲#蠶蟲 係#絲綢 嘅主要原料來源 (silkmoth)
senses.label: 名詞

senses.definition: 強行令人嘔吐 (to force a vomit)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.translation: weight loss by forced vomiting

senses.definition: 講嘢唔禮貌、唔尊重人 (to speak rudely)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.text: 喺皇帝面前出言不遜嘅佢已經封殺咗自己嘅仕途。
examples.jyutping: hai2 wong4 dai3 min6 cin4 ceot1 jin4 bat1 seon3 ge3 keoi5 ji5 ging1 fung1 saat3 zo2 zi6 gei2 ge3 si6 tou4.
examples.translation: By speaking rudely in front of the Emperor, he sabotaged his career as a civil servant.

senses.definition: 通常僱員合約會寫明員工每年有幾多日有薪假期，接近年尾時候，員工放積落好多假期未放，因此員工要放多啲假，呢個行為就叫清假 (to use up one's annual leave; in many cases the employer is contractually obligated to give employees a minimum number of paid leave per year, which implies that if the employee does not take sufficient number of days off during the year, they will be required to clear the balance near the end of the year)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.text: 因為疫情無得遊埠，公司積咗好多假，年底又要清假喇。
examples.translation: I couldn't travel due to the pandemic, and accumulated many days of annual leave. I'll have to use them up by end of this year again.

senses.definition: #籌備 同#舉辦 (to prepare and organise)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.text: 呢個機構每年都為青少年籌辦各種暑期活動。
examples.jyutping: ni1 go3 gei1 kau3 mui5 nin4 dou1 wai4 cing1 siu2 nin4 cau4 baan6 gok3 zung2 syu2 kei4 wut6 dung6.
examples.translation: Every year, this institution prepares and organises various activities for teenagers.

senses.definition: 世代相傳嘅#習慣（量詞：個） (tradition; convention; custom)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.jyutping: zung1 gwok3 cyun4 tung2 zit3 jat6
examples.translation: Chinese traditional festival

senses.definition: 獲授權到處巡視，睇下有冇危險、犯法或者違規 (to patrol; to perform an authorized tour of a given area in search of danger, crime, or violations)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.text: 呢條街夜晚好少警察巡邏㗎。
examples.jyutping: ni1 tiu4 gaai1 je6 maan5 hou2 siu2 ging2 caat3 ceon4 lo4 gaa3.
examples.translation: Very few police officers patrol this street at night.

senses.definition: 未來嘅發展；前景（量詞：個） (future; future prospects)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.jyutping: jat1 fan6 jau5 cin4 tou4 ge3 gung1 zok3
examples.translation: a job with future prospects

senses.definition: 教人某方面嘅知識、技能，盡量令佢學識，務求#傳承 到落去 (to pass on (knowledge, skill, etc.); to impart; to teach)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.text: 我已經將我所識嘅嘢全部傳授咗俾你。
examples.jyutping: ngo5 ji5 ging1 zoeng1 ngo5 so2 sik1 ge3 je5 cyun4 bou6 cyun4 sau6 zo2 bei2 nei5
examples.translation: I have already taught you all that I know.

senses.definition: 淡淡清新嘅芳香 (delicate fragrance)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.jyutping: di1 faa1 jau5 daam6 daam6 ge3 cing1 hoeng1.
examples.translation: The flowers have a delicate fragrance.

senses.definition: 點燃咗嘅#線香（量詞：炷） (lit thread incense stick)

examples.text: 善信請勿攜帶大型香燭，清香一炷足以表達誠心。
examples.jyutping: sin6 seon3 cing2 mat6 kwai4 daai3 daai6 jing4 hoeng1 zuk1, cing1 hoeng1 jat1 zyu3 zuk1 ji5 biu2 daat6 sing4 sam1.
examples.translation: Worshippers please do not bring large incense sticks and candles. A lit thread incense stick is enough to express your sincerity.

senses.definition: 同#顏色 有關嘅 (pertaining to colour)
senses.label: 語素

examples.jyutping: sik1 coi2
examples.translation: colour

senses.definition: 有好多種顏色嘅 (multicolour)

examples.jyutping: coi2 hung4
examples.translation: rainbow

senses.definition: 有關#運氣 嘅 (pertaining to luck)

examples.jyutping: sei3 cung4 coi2
examples.translation: (horse racing betting) Quartet

senses.definition: 讚美、誇獎嘅歡呼聲 (cheer; loud sound expressing praise)

examples.jyutping: hot3 dou2 coi2
examples.translation: to boo; to jeer

senses.definition: 發起；首先建議 (to propose; to advocate; to initiate)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.jyutping: coeng1 ji5 sing4 laap6 ping4 toi4 tou2 leon6
examples.translation: to advocate a discussion platform

senses.definition: 佛教用語；比喻用#慈悲 之心引導眾生，拯救佢哋脱離#苦海 (to deliver all living creatures from suffering with benevolence and compassion; literally: to steer the ship of benevolence to save all living beings)
senses.label: 語句

senses.definition: 參考並比較 (to refer and compare)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.jyutping: seoi2 ping4 caam1 ziu3
examples.translation: standard-referencing

senses.definition: 係組成每邊#髖骨 嘅三嚿骨入面最前嗰嚿，位於陰部對入（量詞：嚿） (pubis, pubic bone)
senses.label: 名詞

senses.definition: 住喺#鄉村 嘅女子（量詞：個） (woman living in a rural village)
senses.label: 名詞

senses.definition: 確定皇位繼承人或君主嘅伴侶嘅名份 (to confer a title on (an empress or a prince))
senses.label: 動詞

examples.jyutping: caak3 laap6 wong4 cyu5
examples.translation: to install the crown prince

senses.definition: #酬謝#神祇 (to thank a deity)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.jyutping: cau4 san4 gung1 jin2
examples.translation: public performances in gratitude to deities

senses.definition: 喺天空上面#飛、行進 (to soar; to hover)
senses.label: 語素

examples.jyutping: fei1 coeng4
examples.translation: to fly high

senses.definition: 緩慢而穩定 (slowly and steadily)
senses.label: 副詞

examples.text: 只要徐徐咁移動，就唔會俾人發現。
examples.translation: If we move slowly, no one will discover us.

senses.definition: 將物件嘅使用權暫時交俾其化人以換取金錢；#租 出去 (to lease; to let)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.jyutping: dim3 pou3 ceot1 zou1
examples.translation: shops to let

senses.definition: 利用其他人嘅同情心去施壓，迫佢去做某樣嘢 (emotional extortion; emotional blackmail; to pressure another person to do something out of guilt or care for the person)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.text: 佢阿媽咁多年嚟都係噉樣情緒勒索佢，所以佢先咁想搬出去自己住。
examples.jyutping: keoi5 aa3 maa1 gam3 do1 nin4 lei4 dou1 hai6 gam2 joeng2 cing4 seoi5 lak6 sok3 keoi5, so2 ji5 keoi5 sin1 gam3 soeng2 bun1 ceot1 heoi3 zi6 gei2 zyu6.
examples.translation: His mother had been emotionally blackmailing him for so many years, so he wanted to move out and live on his own.

senses.definition: 引申為一啲傷心、痛苦嘅經歷 (metaphor for sad, traumatic experience)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.translation: to use someone's traumatic experience against him; literally: to open up a scar

senses.definition: 生瘡留低嘅疤痕 (the scar of a boil)
形容各種各樣奇怪嘅事物現象 (to have all sorts of strange things and phenomenons; to be exceedingly strange)
senses.label: 形容詞

examples.text: 而家啲人啲減肥方法真係千奇百怪。
examples.jyutping: ji4 gaa1 di1 jan4 di1 gaam2 fei4 fong1 faat3 zan1 hai6 cin1 kei4 baak3 gwaai3.
examples.translation: Nowadays people's methods to lose weight are exceedingly strange.

senses.definition: 遇到困難嘅時候唔會衝動，能夠如常運用理智 (cool-headed; calm)
senses.label: 形容詞

examples.text: 面對壓力，運動員依然表現沉着。
examples.jyutping: min6 deoi3 aat3 lik6, wan6 dung6 jyun4 ji1 jin4 biu2 jin6 cam4 zoek6.
examples.translation: Under stress, athletes still act calmly.

jyutping: caa1 zi1 hou4 lei4 mau6 ji5 cin1 lei5
caa1 zi1 hou4 lei4 mau6 zi1 cin1 lei5

senses.definition: 開始嘅時候雖然相差少少，到最尾就會差好遠，造成極大錯誤。 (the slightest difference leads to a huge error; a miss is as good as a mile)
senses.label: 語句

caa zi hou lei mau ji cin lei
caa1 zi1 hou4 lei4 mau6 zi1 cin1 lei5

senses.definition: 見返面 (to reunite; to meet again)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.jyutping: gau2 bit6 cung4 fung4
examples.translation: to meet again after a long period of separation

senses.definition: 謀求吉祥之事，避開災難 (to seek luck and avoid calamity)
senses.label: 動詞

senses.definition: 謀求有利嘅一面，避開有損害嘅嗰一面 (to seek gain or profit and avoid harm)
senses.label: 動詞

senses.definition: 將一啲嘢放喺一個地方一段比較長嘅時間 (to leave something somewhere for safe keeping)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.text: 我去美國之前，將幾箱雜物存放喺朋友屋企。
examples.jyutping: ngo5 heoi3 mei5 gwok3 zi1 cin4, zoeng3 gei2 soeng1 zaap6 mat6 cyun4 fong3 hai2 pang4 jau5 uk1 kei2.
examples.translation: I left several boxes of sundries with my friend before I travelled to America.

senses.definition: 方便殘障人士使用嘅#洗手間，空間比較寬敞方便#輪椅 進入，亦會有扶手畀使用者扶住去坐低同起身（量詞：間） (accessible toilet; literally: handicap toilet)
senses.label: 名詞

senses.definition: 喺#車 入面進行#性行為 (to have sex inside a car)
senses.label: 動詞

senses.definition: #去（某個地方） (to go to; to head for; to leave for)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.text: 前往羅湖嘅乘客，請等候下一班列車。
examples.jyutping: cin4 wong5 lo4 wu4 ge3 sing4 haak3, cing2 dang2 hau6 haa6 jat1 baan1 lit6 ce1
examples.translation: Passengers going to Lo Wu, please wait for the next train.

senses.definition: 空氣、地上或者物件表面嘅微粒，可以飄起，成份包括#泥土、#死皮、#蟎、#花粉 等（量詞：粒／層） (dust; dirt)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.jyutping: uk1 kei2 zan1 hai6 do1 can4!
examples.translation: Our home is so dusty!

senses.definition: 未經批准就#衝 入去 (to rush in; to break in)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.text: 一名賊人半夜闖入一間便利店行劫。
examples.jyutping: jat1 ming4 caak6 jan4 bun3 je2 cong2 jap6 jat1 gaan1 bin6 lei6 dim3 hang4 gip3.
examples.translation: A thief broke into a convenience store in the middle of the night to commit a robbery.

senses.definition: 到外面嘅世界探索、體驗，等自己適應呢個環境嘅挑戰 (to venture out (into the world); to temper oneself by battling through difficulties; to explore and break through)

examples.text: 年青人應該趁後生出去闖吓。
examples.jyutping: nin4 cing1 jan4 jing1 goi1 can3 hau6 saang1 ceot1 heoi3 cong2 haa5.
examples.translation: Young people should venture out when they are still young.

senses.definition: 繼承人接傳某一種技藝或流派風格嘅人 (successor)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.text: 班傑明．葛羅斯文諾被譽為「貝多芬傳人」。
examples.translation: Benjamin Grosvenor is known as the successor of Beethoven.

senses.definition: 後代 (descendants)

examples.translation: descendants of the dragons

senses.definition: 喺某機構度留低記錄 (to save a record)
senses.label: 動詞

senses.definition: 受到皇帝嘅 #寵愛 (to be in favor of the emperor)
senses.label: 動詞

senses.definition: 皇帝同後宮妃嬪行房 (to have sexual intercourse with the emperor)
長睡不起，比喻某人已死 (to be dead; literally "eternal slumber")
senses.label: 動詞

examples.text: 呢位一代宗師漂泊半生，最終長眠香港。
examples.translation: This famous master has been wandering for half of his life, and finally laid to rest in Hong Kong.

senses.definition: 本義指失足跌低，比喻失意 (to fall down)
senses.label: 動詞

senses.definition: 浪費時間、虛度光陰 (to waste time; to idle away)

examples.jyutping: co1 to4 seoi3 jyut6
examples.translation: to waste time

senses.definition: 陳述言詞 (to give a speech)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.translation: heartfelt speech

senses.definition: 將啱啱蒸好嘅糕點由個蒸籠裏面拎出嚟 (freshly steamed (food); fresh out of the steamer)
senses.label: 動詞

senses.definition: 將人哋嘅作品或意念聲稱為自己嘅構思使用 (to plagiarise; to pirate; to lift)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.text: 學生抄襲其他人嘅功課，係唔誠實嘅行為。
examples.translation: Plagarising the work of other students is an act of dishonesty.

senses.definition: 逐步侵佔；係以蠶蟲不停進食桑葉嘅形象嚟比喻 (to nibble away up; to encroach; to erode; a metaphorical expression of invasion with the image of silkworms eating white mulberry leaves in a non-stop manner)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.text: 接二連三嘅醜聞蠶食緊市民對政府嘅信心。
examples.jyutping: zip3 ji6 lin4 saam1 ge3 cau2 man4 caam4 sik6 gan2 si5 man4 deoi3 zing3 fu2 ge3 seon3 sam1.
examples.translation: The faith of the citizens towards the government is nibbling away at a spate of scandals.

senses.definition: 表示事情喺冇耐之前啱啱發生 ((compare 先 Sin1 sense 3; 先至 Siun1Zi3) not until)
senses.label: 副詞

examples.text: 佢琴日先話我知佢要結婚。
examples.jyutping: keoi5 kam4 jat6 sin1 waa6 ngo5 zi1 keoi5 jiu3 git3 fan1.
examples.translation: She didn't tell me she is getting married until yesterday.

senses.definition: 僅、只有 (just)

examples.text: 我第一次見佢嗰陣，佢先得五歲。
examples.jyutping: ngo5 dai6 jat1 ci3 gin3 keoi5 go2 zan6, keoi5 sin1 dak1 ng5 seoi3.
examples.translation: He was just five when I first met him.

senses.definition: 前面用「只有」、「必須」、「因為」、「由於」等條件介詞配合，去表示只有喺某種條件下、或由於某種原因、目的，然後連接會發生嘅事 (under particular circumstances to be able to do sth (compare 先 Sin1 sense 3; 先至 Siun1Zi3))

examples.text: 我要點樣做先可以得到佢嘅芳心呢？
examples.jyutping: ngo5 jiu3 dim2 joeng2 zou6 sin1 ho2 ji5 dak1 dou3 keoi5 ge3 fong1 sam1 nei1?
examples.translation: What exactly should I do to win her heart?

senses.definition: 表示強調嘅語氣 (used for emphasis)
呢邊興起，嗰邊下沉，形容連綿不斷 (to rise on one side and fall on the other side; to be continuous)
senses.label: 語句

senses.definition: 角色或崗位同自己類近，但係比自己年長或者資深嘅人（量詞：位／個） (senior; someone older, more experienced)
senses.label: 名詞

senses.definition: 專門借錢俾人嘅金融機構，審批比較鬆手同快速；俗稱#財仔（量詞：間） (money lending companies, usually with easier and faster approval procedures)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.text: 呢幾年公司生意好差，我唯有問財務公司借錢周轉住先。
examples.jyutping: ni1 gei2 nin4 gung1 si1 saang1 ji3 hou2 caa1, ngo5 wai4 jau5 man6 coi4 mou6 gung1 si1 ze3 cin2 zau1 zyun2 zyu6 sin1.
examples.translation: In recent years, businesses went south and I had no way but to go to the financial company to keep up with the cash flow.

senses.definition: 將一啲#犯法、#犯規 嘅物品收走，由公家#接收 (to confiscate)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.text: 呢啲冒牌貨俾警方充公晒。
examples.jyutping: ni1 di1 mou6 paai2 fo3 bei2 ging2 fong1 cung1 gung1 saai3.
examples.translation: The fake goods were confiscated by the police.

senses.definition: 將稻苗插植於水田中，係栽培水稻嘅過程之一 (to transplant a rice seedling)
senses.label: 動詞

senses.definition: #解僱；#炒 咗一個人，令佢冇得再做呢個職位；多數用喺軍隊、紀律部隊、重要官員身上 (to discharge someone; to fire someone in formal occassions)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.jyutping: cit3 zik1 caa4 baan6
examples.translation: to dismiss someone and prosecute him

senses.definition: 利用#潮汐 嘅動能嚟發電嘅方法；係一種可再生能源，同水力發電相似，主要透過用水嘅動能帶動渦輪嚟發電，而詳細嘅設計就分咗好多種 (tidal power)
senses.label: 名詞

senses.definition: 離開屋企去出面；可以指短時間外出，亦都可以指遠途旅程 (to leave home and go outside; to be away from home for a short period of time or a long journey)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.text: 出門記得買旅行保險呀！
examples.jyutping: ceot1 mun4 gei3 dak1 maai5 leoi5 hang4 bou2 him2 aa3!
examples.translation: Do remember to purchase travel insurance when you go on a trip!

senses.definition: （球類運動）球員被#停賽 (to be suspended in ball games; literally: sit ball prison)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.text: 佢連續兩場攞黃牌，被罰坐波監，最後一場分組賽冇得出。
examples.jyutping: keoi5 lin4 zuk6 loeng5 coeng4 lo2 wong4 paai2, bei6 fat6 co5 bo1 gaam1, zeoi3 hau6 jat1 coeng4 fan1 zou2 coi3 mou5 dak1 ceot1.
examples.translation: Warned for two matches in a row, he will be suspended for the last match of the group stages.

senses.definition: 昆蟲侵襲滋擾生態嘅災害（量詞：個／次／場） (insect infestation)
senses.label: 名詞

senses.label: 動詞

examples.text: 佢下個月會喺日本出席一個研討會。
examples.jyutping: keoi5 haa6 go3 jyut6 wui5 hai2 jat6 bun2 ceot1 zik6 jat1 go3 jin4 tou2 wui2.
examples.translation: He will attend a conference in Japan next month.

senses.definition: 泛指用電磁原理嚟儲資料嘅儲存裝置；通常指電腦嘅一種小型儲存裝置，係一隻圓形有磁性鍍膜嘅薄片，包響一個方形軟膠或硬膠套裏面，常見呎吋有3.5吋、5.25吋、8吋，容量由不足1Mb至數百Mb都有；自從#光碟 同#USB 手指出現之後，已經被淘汰 (magnetic storage, mostly refer to floppy disk)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.text: 磁碟咁大塊，容量又細，依家仲有人用㗎咩？
examples.jyutping: ci4 dip2 gam3 daai6 faai3, jung4 loeng6 jau6 sai3, ji4 gaa1 zung6 jau5 jan4 jung6 gaa3 me1?
examples.translation: Floppy disks are unwieldy and have small storage capacity. Does anybody still use them anyway?

senses.definition: 透過用手揸壓，或者將物件放喺兩隻手掌中間然後不斷打圈，改變物件形狀 (to rub something while applying pressure; to roll)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.jyutping: zoeng1 min6 fan2 caai1 sing4 siu2 tyun4 zong6
examples.translation: to roll the dough into small dough balls

senses.definition: 引申指施行心肺復甦法，即係#搓人，一般讀 caai1 (to perform cardiopulmonary resuscitation (usually read caai1))

senses.definition: 依照樂曲發聲；用人聲發出旋律 (to sing)

senses.definition: 四處宣揚 (to spread)

senses.definition: #自然科學 無辦法解釋嘅 (supernatural)

examples.jyutping: ciu1 zi6 jin4 jin6 zoeng6
examples.translation: supernatural

senses.definition: 高過正常、應有水平 (to exceed an expected level; to surpass)
senses.label: 動詞

senses.definition: 以前嘅成果全部廢棄，變得冇用 (to waste all previous efforts)

examples.text: 你而家放棄就前功盡廢㗎喇！
examples.jyutping: nei5 ji4 gaa1 fong3 hei3 zau6 cin4 gung1 zeon6 fai3 gaa3 laa3!

senses.definition: 佈下計謀 (to devise a stratagem)

examples.jyutping: ni1 dou6 saang1 saai3 ceng1 toi4, jing1 goi1 mou5 jan4 daa2 lei5.
examples.translation: The moss is growing, I think no one is tidy here.

senses.definition: 叫某人或物做某名物；為某人或物冠上某稱號 (to call or to refer to someone or something as; to give a title to somebody or something; to know as)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.text: 香港、台灣、韓國同新加坡被稱為亞洲四小龍。

senses.definition: 叫某人或物做某名物；為某人或物冠上某稱號（同「#稱為」唔同嘅地方係，「稱之為」有代詞「之」複指，用法係「稱之為＋名號」。） (to call somebody or something as; to refer to as (Note: the difference between 稱之為 and #稱為 cing1wai4 is that, 稱之為 is inclusive of the pronoun; the form of usage is usually "稱之為 + title".))
senses.label: 動詞

examples.text: 佢已經連續做咗三十幾個鐘頭未瞓過，可以稱之為「鐵人」。

senses.definition: 未有內容 NO DATA
#詳盡#仔細、唔忽略任何細節嘅 (detailed; precise)

examples.jyutping: keoi5 gaai2 sik1 dak1 hou2 coeng4 sai3.

senses.definition: #猜#謎語 (to guess riddles)

senses.definition: 冇禮貌嘅；市井嘅 (rude; vulgar)

senses.definition: 高於原本嘅標準；勝過之前嘅狀態 (to surpass; to surmount; to overstep)

examples.jyutping: ciu1 ceot1 jyu6 syun3

examples.jyutping: lou5 sai3 ceot1 min2 hoeng3 daai6 gaa1 gaai2 sik1 gaam2 san1 ge3 jyun4 jan1.
examples.translation: Our boss appeared personally and explained to us the reasons for the salary cuts.

senses.definition: 叫人快啲做嘢或者將事情做好 (to urge; to hurry; to pressure somebody to quickly start doing or complete some task)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.text: 不斷催促只會令人哋心情變差。
examples.jyutping: bat1 dyun6 ceoi1 cuk1 zi2 wui5 ling6 jan4 dei6 sam1 cing4 bin3 caa1.
examples.translation: Constantly pressuring people will only make them feel bad.

senses.definition: 指兩個人或者兩樣事物喺質素或者數字上有分別 (to differ, in terms of qualities or quantities)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.text: 你同我嘅智商差太遠喇！
examples.jyutping: nei5 tung4 ngo5 ge3 zi3 soeng1 caa1 taai3 jyun5 laa3!
examples.translation: Your IQ is lower than mine with a large margin!

senses.definition: #缺少；#爭；高唔過、少過某個標準 (to lack; to miss out; to fall short of a certain standard)

examples.jyutping: ngo5 caa1 jat1 fan1 sin1 zi3 hap6 gaak3 aa3!
examples.translation: I'm one mark short of the passing mark.

senses.definition: 實際咁做啲有用嘅嘢，唔係得把口 (to put effort into doing something)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.text: 佢淨係識出聲，做嘅時候就唔出力。
examples.jyutping: keoi5 zing6 hai6 sik1 ceot1 seng1, zou6 ge3 si4 hau6 zau6 m4 ceot1 lik6.
examples.translation: He talks the talk but does not walk the walk.

senses.definition: 出問題；衰咗；失敗 (to fail; to perform badly; to flop)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.text: 唉，我考試炒咗粉，下年睇嚟都要重考喇。
examples.jyutping: aai2, ngo5 haau2 si5 caau2 zo2 fan2, haa6 nin2 tai2 lai4 dou1 jiu3 cung4 haau2 laa3.
examples.translation: Sigh, I think I flopped the exam, I will probably need to retake it next year.

senses.definition: 喺器官或者局部組織入面嘅血液流量增加 (hyperaemia; the increase of blood flow to certain tissue or organ)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.text: 紓緩鼻塞嘅產品大多數係令到鼻腔入面嘅血管短暫收縮、減少充血。
examples.jyutping: syu1 wun4 bei6 sak1 ge3 caan2 ban2 daai6 do1 sou3 hai6 ling6 dou3 bei6 hong1 jap6 min6 ge3 hyut3 gun2 dyun2 zaam6 sau1 suk1, gaam2 siu2 cung1 hyut3.
examples.translation: Decongestants usually induce temporary vasoconstriction of blood vessels in the nose in order to relieve nasal congestion due to hyperemia.

senses.definition: 確切指出當前社會嘅弊病 (to address present-day issues; to hit on or delve into modern-day problems)
senses.label: 語句

examples.text: 呢齣廣播劇往往切中時弊，幾十年來廣受聽眾歡迎。
examples.jyutping: ni1 ceot1 gwong2 bo3 kek6 wong5 wong5 cit3 zung3 si4 bai6, gei2 sap6 nin4 loi4 gwong2 sau6 ting3 zung3 fun1 jing4.
examples.translation: The radio drama often delves into the current problems in society and has been very popular for decades.

senses.definition: 不斷攻擊對方，消耗對方體力嘅戰術 (attrition; a tactic whereby one engages in unrelenting attacks so as to wear down the opponent's might)
senses.label: 名詞

senses.definition: 用膳嘅方式，指有人喺側跟餵食，自己唔使郁手食嘅餐 (spoon-fed meal; literally: handicapped meal)

senses.definition: 引申用嚟形容一啲有人做晒決定，唔使用腦嘅事 (used to describe things that have been planned ahead by someone else so that one does not need to think)
好賣得；好多人買；#銷情 理想 (to sell well; to be popular; to be in great demand)

senses.definition: 喺中醫學入面，指消除#熱氣 ((in Chinese medicine) to alleviate internal heat)

examples.translation: You can alleviate internal heat by eating watermelon.

senses.definition: 唔完整；有部分缺失，可指物件或人體嘅缺陷 (incomplete; with missing parts, can refer to objects or human bodies' defects)

examples.translation: Even if there are defects in their bodies, they can also live like normal people.

senses.definition: 未按照規定擅自興建嘅建築物，冇 #僭建物 咁正式 (unauthorised building, not as formal as #僭建物)

examples.translation: If you notice any unauthorised buildings, you can also report it to the Land Department.

senses.definition: 喺二人愛情嘅觀念下，同某個人爭同一個愛慕對象嘅人（量詞：個） (rival in love)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.text: 情敵多多我都唔怕，我有信心好快就可以奪得佢嘅芳心。

senses.definition: 用嚟表示對有人催人做嘢嘅不滿 (used to object to somebody telling one to hurry up)

senses.definition: 比較雙方嘅付出，常用於雙方付出不合比例嘅情況。「雞」通常係比喻出嘅份量大，「豉油」係比喻出嘅份量細。講「豉油」同「雞」嘅次序可掉轉「……出豉油……出雞」, 出豉油嘅一方通常係抵/賺，出雞嘅一方通常係蝕。 (Comparison on two parties' contributions in a collaboration. Usually used when the contribution distribution is disproportional; while "chicken" (gai1) means the larger part, the soy sauce (si6 jau4) means the smaller part, one side provides more than the other. Literally means "you provide the chicken, I provide the soy sauce." Order can be reversed "...provide the soy sauce,  ...provide the chicken." The side who provides the soy sauce is normally perceived as getting the better of the exchange, while the side providing the chicken is seen as getting the shorter end of the stick.)
senses.label: 語句

examples.text: 人哋出雞，你淨係出豉油咋，呢單交易抵到爛啦！
