senses.label: 名詞

senses.definition: 香港地區名；係位於#荃灣 對出嘅島，屬於葵青區 (Tsing Yi)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.text: 青馬大橋連接青衣同馬灣。
examples.jyutping: cing1 maa5 daai6 kiu4 lin4 zip3 cing1 ji1 tung4 maa5 waan1.
examples.translation: Tsing Ma Bridge connects Tsing Yi and Ma Wan.

senses.definition: #痴迷 咁#幻想 唔可以實現嘅事 (to imagine something impossible to happen)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.text: 你咁嘅分數想讀醫，唔好痴心妄想啦！
examples.jyutping: nei5 gam3 ge3 fan1 sou3 soeng2 duk6 ji1, m4 hou2 ci1 sam1 mong5 soeng2 laa1!
examples.translation: You want to study medicine with this kind of examination results? Don't even imagine!

senses.definition: 撤走#僑民 (to evacuate expatriates)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.text: 疫症爆發之後，各國政府派出專機撤僑。
examples.jyutping: jik6 zing3 baau3 faat3 zi1 hau6, gok3 gwok3 zing3 fu2 paai3 ceot1 zyun1 gei1 cit3 kiu4.
examples.translation: After the outbreak of the epidemic, the governments sent planes to evacuate expatriates from there.

senses.definition: 香港地名；清水灣半島嘅簡稱；位於#新界#西貢 區南部，將西面#將軍澳 水域同東面牛尾海分隔 (Clear Water Bay Peninsula)
senses.label: 名詞

senses.definition: 香港海灣名；位於清水灣半島東南部，設泳灘 (Clear Water Bay, a bay on the eastern shore of Clear Water Bay Peninsula of Hong Kong)
指某個人個仔娶老婆 (to have a newly wedded daughter-in-law; (of one's son) to marry a woman)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.jyutping: can4 taai2 ting1 jat6 ceoi2 san1 pou5 laa3!
examples.translation: Mrs. Chan's son is getting married tomorrow!

senses.definition: 東亞節日名，又叫做乞巧節、七姐誕，喺香港定於農曆七月七日，會喺夜晚慶祝。一般視作同婦女乞求針黹巧藝相關；另外後世有啲人亦都會因為當晚牛郎、織女喺天上相會嘅傳説而視之為情人嘅節日。 (Qixi Festival; the seventh evening of the seventh lunar month (in Hong Kong))
senses.label: 名詞

senses.definition: 物件或時間嘅長度達到某個水平 ((length of object or time) to reach; to last for)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.text: 香港日治時期長達三年零八個月。
examples.jyutping: hoeng1 gong2 jat6 zi6 si4 kei4 coeng4 daat6 saam1 nin4 ling4 baat3 go3 jyut6.
examples.translation: The Japanese occupation of Hong Kong lasted for 3 months and 8 months.

senses.definition: 事業最輝煌、成就最鼎盛嘅日子；高峰（量詞：個／段） (heyday; peak period)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.text: 七十年代係粵語流行曲嘅全盛時期。
examples.jyutping: cat1 sap6 nin4 doi6 hai6 jyut6 jyu5 lau4 hang4 kuk1 ge3 cyun4 sing6 si4 kei4.
examples.translation: 1970s is the golden age of Cantopop.

senses.definition: 擺喺共用場地，畀人暫時擺著嘢鎖起佢先嘅#櫃（量詞：個） (locker)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.jyutping: wan6 dung6 coeng4 cyu5 mat6 gwai6.
examples.translation: sports ground locker.

senses.definition: 儲存物品嘅#櫃 (cabinet)
坐喺某個地方，冇郁嚟郁去 (to sit still)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.jyutping: co5 ding6 ding6 dang2 ngo5 faan1 lai4 haa2, gwaai1.
examples.translation: Sit still to wait for me to come back, be good.

senses.definition: 事情接住另一件事發生，兩件事有連帶關係 (to ensue)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.text: 當大家都唔尊重法律嘅時候，隨之而來嘅就係成個法律制度嘅崩壞。
examples.jyutping: dong1 daai6 gaa1 dou1 m4 zyun1 zung6 faat3 leot6 ge3 si4 hau6, ceoi4 zi1 ji4 loi4 ge3 zau6 hai6 sing4 go3 faat3 leot6 zai3 dou6 ge3 bang1 waai6.
examples.translation: With no one respecting the law, the entire system of law collapses.

senses.definition: #炒#米粉 (fried rice vermicelli)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.translation: Singapore style fried rice vermicelli

senses.definition: 進入同離開邊境 (the immigration and departure)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.text: 沙士期間，出入境旅客都要檢查體温。
examples.jyutping: saa1 si2 kei4 gaan1, ceot1 jap6 ging2 leoi5 haak3 dou1 jiu3 gim2 caa4 tai2 wan1.
examples.translation: During SARS, the arriving and departing visitors are required to have their body temperature checked.

senses.definition: 主要做 #入口 同 #出口 嘅貿易公司（量詞：間） (import-export corporation)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.text: 我而家喺一間出入口公司打工。
examples.jyutping: ngo5 ji4 gaa1 hai2 jat1 gaan1 ceot1 jap6 hau2 gung1 si1 daa2 gung1.
examples.translation: I work in an import-export corporation.

senses.definition: 祝福人平安嘅吉祥語句，通常寫喺#揮春 上面 (a common blessing: be safe when leaving and entering, i.e. be safe always.)
senses.label: 語句

examples.text: 祝你新年快樂，出入平安！
examples.jyutping: zuk1 nei5 san1 nin4 faai3 lok6, ceot1 jap6 ping4 on1!
examples.translation: I wish you a happy new year and be safe as always.

senses.definition: 全間學校 (the whole school; everyone from the school)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.jyutping: cyun4 haau6 hok6 saang1
examples.translation: all students from the school

senses.definition: 即將實現嘅預言 (prophecy that will be fulfilled)
senses.label: 語素

examples.translation: an unfortunate prophecy that was fulfilled

senses.definition: 斟茶嘅時候，隔開茶同茶葉嘅漏斗 (tea funnel)
senses.label: 名詞

senses.definition: 7 (seven)
senses.label: 數詞

senses.definition: 直遮，冇得摺嘅#遮（量詞：把） (long, straight umbrella)
senses.label: 名詞

senses.definition: 講起嘢上嚟可以講唔停口、沒完沒了 (long-winded; talking on and on in a repetitive way)
senses.label: 形容詞

examples.text: 你唔好咁長氣啦，我記得㗎喇！
examples.jyutping: nei5 m4 hou2 gam3 coeng4 hei3 laa1, ngo5 gei3 dak1 gaa3 laa3!
examples.translation: You don't need to keep going on and on, I've got it already!

senses.definition: 兩個價錢嘅差距（量詞：個） (difference in price)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.text: 條裙買咗返去發覺唔啱嘅話，可以拎返嚟換其他貨品，到時補返個差價就得㗎喇。
examples.jyutping: tiu4 kwan4 maai5 zo2 faan1 heoi3 faat3 gok3 m4 aam1 ge3 waa2, ho2 ji5 ling1 faan1 lai4 wun6 kei4 taa1 fo3 ban2, dou3 si4 bou2 faan1 go3 caa1 gaa3 zau6 dak1 gaa3 laa3.
examples.translation: If the dress doesn't fit, you can return it for another product as long as the difference in price is paid.

senses.definition: （中醫術語）指食物、體質性熱 (a Chinese medicine terminology which means that the nature of a kind of food, medicine, human body constitution is 'hot and dry')
senses.label: 形容詞

examples.text: 你體質燥熱呀，一定要飲多啲水先得㗎。
examples.jyutping: nei5 tai2 zat1 cou3 jit6 aa3, jat1 ding6 jiu3 jam2 do1 di1 seoi2 sin1 dak1 gaa3.
examples.translation: Your body constitution is of 'heat and drought', so you must drink more water.

senses.definition: 將兩個人拉埋一齊，令到佢哋識得對方 (to match, especially a pair of lovers)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.text: 佢兩個咪就係我撮合㗎囉。
examples.jyutping: keoi5 loeng5 go3 mai6 zau6 hai6 ngo5 cyut3 hap6 gaa3 lo1.
examples.translation: It's me who matched these two up.

senses.definition: 玩玩吓，唔認真咁參與，但求開心 (whimsical; not serious)
senses.label: 副詞

examples.text: 我哋柴娃娃去參加歌唱比賽。
examples.jyutping: ngo5 dei6 caai4 waa1 waa1 heoi3 caam1 gaa1 go1 coeng3 bei2 coi3.
examples.translation: We are joining the singing contest just for fun.

senses.definition: 以米發酵而成嘅日本傳統酒類，清澈透明冇沉澱物 (rice wine; usually referring to sake)
senses.label: 名詞

senses.definition: 註冊 #結婚；或者泛指喺任何法律文件度簽名，令契約生效 (to register a marriage; literally: sign papers; less commonly used for signing paperwork to enter other legal arrangements)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.text: 總編輯同佢男朋友靜雞雞簽咗紙喇，你得閒賀下佢啦。
examples.translation: The chief editor and her boyfriend got married secretly. You should congratulate her sometime!

senses.definition: 指其中一方贏面較大、形勢較有利、#領先、佔優；響評比幾個選項嗰陣，將其中一個放到前列位置 (to point out one of the counterparts has advantage in the match; to put the candidate(s) to the leading position in a rating)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.text: 今場法國唔齊腳，唔係秤先好多㗎咋。
examples.translation: In this match France doesn't have all the stars available, it doesn't have much advantages in the match.

senses.definition: 啱啱開始嗰陣；最初嘅時候 (at first; originally; in the beginning)
senses.label: 副詞

examples.text: 我初時唔係好想做嗰份工㗎咋，不過冇得揀就唯有做住先啦。
examples.jyutping: ngo5 co1 si4 m4 hai6 hou2 soeng2 zou6 go2 fan6 gung1 gaa3 zaa3, bat1 gwo3 mou5 dak1 gaan2 zau6 wai4 jau5 zou6 zyu6 sin1 laa1.
examples.translation: At first I didn't want to take that job, but then I had no choice and I had to take it for that moment.

senses.definition: 非常之令人尷尬 (embarassing, disgraceful, annoying)
senses.label: 語句

examples.text: 成八歲仔返學都仲賴尿，真係醜死鬼。
examples.jyutping: seng4 baat3 seoi3 zai2 faan1 hok6 dou1 zung6 laai6 niu6, zan1 hai6 cau2 sei2 gwai2.
examples.translation: You are wetting yourself at school even at eight. How embarrassing!

senses.definition: 討論區或者通訊軟件入面，一段留言因為冇人回應所以跌咗落去目錄下面，更加冇機會俾人睇到 (fall out of attention; literally: sink to the bottom)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.text: 你篇文晨早沉咗底，再推都係冇人理你㗎喇
examples.translation: Your post sank straight away. Even if you kept commenting, nobody would care.

senses.definition: 處理 (to deal with; to handle)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.text: 你諗住點樣處置呢部舊電腦？
examples.jyutping: nei5 nam2 zyu6 dim2 joeng2 cyu5 zi3 nei1 bou6 gau6 din6 nou5?
examples.translation: How will you deal with this old computer?

senses.definition: 懲罰 (to punish)

examples.text: 我地點處置呢個反骨仔好？
examples.jyutping: ngo5 dei6 dim2 cyu5 zi3 nei1 go3 faan2 gwat1 zai2 hou2
examples.translation: How should we punish this traitor?

senses.definition: 即係#公里 (kilometre)
senses.label: 量詞

senses.definition: 出騙術、詭計去呃人或者瞞住人 (to perform tricks; to cheat; literally: to take out trick)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.text: 一早估到佢會出籠撩㗎啦。
examples.translation: I knew from the start he will play tricks.

senses.definition: 身體入面維持#血液#循環，嚟到輸送氣體、營養、血細胞同#荷爾蒙 等等嘅系統 (circulatory system; cardiovascular system)
senses.label: 名詞

senses.definition: 講説話 (to speak; to utter)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.jyutping: ceot1 jin4 bat1 seon3
examples.translation: to speak insolently

senses.definition: #重；唔#輕 (heavyweight; heavy)
senses.label: 形容詞

examples.text: 打拳係咪越重磅越着數？
examples.jyutping: daa2 kyun2 hai6 mai6 jyut6 cung5 bong2 jyut6 zoek6 sou3?
examples.translation: Is being heavy an advantage in boxing?

senses.definition: #重要 兼#震撼 (important; significant; astonishing)

examples.jyutping: cung5 bong2 siu1 sik1! go1 san4 jiu3 teoi3 jau1!
examples.translation: Earth-shattering news! The God of Singer is to retire!

senses.definition: 相機#快門 聲 (sound of camera shutter)
senses.label: 擬聲詞

senses.definition: #檢查；睇一睇 (to check; to find out; to make sure; to confirm)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.jyutping: cek1 sou3
examples.translation: to check the account

senses.definition: 字面意思係指某人隨便説話都可以成為文章；指人口才好，有學養 (used to describe somebody with good oratory skills and being well educated; literally: casually spoken words are capable of becoming literature)
senses.label: 形容詞

examples.text: 佢出口成文，文采斐然，果然係文學期刊嘅編輯。
examples.jyutping: keoi5 ceot1 hau2 sing4 man4, man4 coi2 fei2 jin4, gwo2 jin4 hai6 man4 hok6 kei4 hon1 ge3 pin1 cap1.
examples.translation: What he says sounds like a well-written essay! No wonder he is an editor of a literary journal.

senses.definition: 切碎咗嘅#葱（量詞：粒／拃） (finely chopped scallion)
senses.label: 名詞

senses.definition: 某人用自己嘅口講出嚟，唔係叫其他人轉述 (in person; personally)
senses.label: 副詞

examples.text: 呢件事佢係親口同我講嘅。
examples.translation: She told me about this incident herself.

senses.definition: #痛 (painful)
senses.label: 形容詞

senses.definition: 加強語氣，通常係好嬲，或者搞笑、諷刺 (added after the main verb to stress the negative meaning)
senses.label: 副詞

examples.text: 呢個電視台又欠牌費又欠糧，執柒咗佢啦！
examples.jyutping: ni1 go3 din6 si6 toi4 jau6 him3 paai4 fai3 jau6 him3 loeng4, zap1 cat6 zo2 keoi5 laa1!
examples.translation: This TV station owes the license fee and its staff salaries. Go fucking bankrupt!

senses.definition: 睇落幾奸；行事作風冇乜道德 (looks evil; behaves as if without concern of moral.)
senses.label: 形容詞

examples.text: 佢笑起個嚟個樣好邪派。
examples.translation: He looks evil when he grins.

senses.definition: 形容求其、或畀麻麻哋嘅條件去養小朋友、寵物、植物嘅方法、態度 (to describe an attitude to grow a child or pet in a not so great condition)
senses.label: 語句

examples.text: 呢種花粗生粗養，唔洗點打理。
examples.translation: This is a tough flower, you don't have to take care of it so much.

senses.definition: 事情一開始嘅時候 (first; at first)
senses.label: 副詞

examples.jyutping: co1 tau4 go2 gei2 jat6
examples.translation: the first few days

senses.definition: 收埋#寶藏 (to bury treasure)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.jyutping: cong4 bou2 tou4
examples.translation: treaure map

senses.definition: 做嘢唔#小心 (sloppy and careless; literally: thick branch and broad leaf)
senses.label: 形容詞

examples.text: 阿松個人粗枝大葉噉，都唔知靠唔靠得住嘅。
examples.translation: A-chung is so sloppy and careless. I am not sure if he can be relied on.

senses.definition: 之前試過或做過 (previously; before; have done or tried something)
senses.label: 語素

examples.jyutping: cang4 ging1
examples.translation: previously; before; once

senses.definition: 用水排走#馬桶 或者#尿兜 入面嘅排泄物 (to flush the toilet)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.jyutping: o1 jyun4 si2 cing2 gei3 dak1 cung1 ci3.
examples.translation: Please remember to flush the toilet after defecating.

senses.definition: 喺全部嘅樣本裏面抽一部份出來 (to sample; to select sth from a whole)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.jyutping: ceoi4 gei1 cau1 joeng2
examples.translation: to randomly sample

senses.definition: 未能獲得參與下一階段比賽嘅資格 (to be out of a game; to fail to qualify for the next round of the competition)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.jyutping: keoi5 hai2 co1 coi3 zau6 ceot1 zo2 guk6 laa3.
examples.translation: He is already out in the first round.

senses.definition: 可憐（人或事） (poor; pitiable; poor thing)
senses.label: 形容詞

examples.text: 佢啱啱俾老細炒咗，真係慘慘豬。
examples.jyutping: keoi5 aam1 aam1 bei2 lou5 sai3 caau2 zo2, zan1 hai6 caam2 caam2 zyu1.
examples.translation: This poor man was just fired by his boss.

senses.definition: 抽出空閒時間 (to find time)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.text: 多謝你抽空來睇我嘅表演。
examples.translation: Thank you for taking the time to watch my performance.

senses.definition: 將空氣抽走 (to draw air out)
用嚟#沖廁 所嘅水 (toilet bowl water)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.text: 大部分香港嘅廁所水係鹹水嚟。
examples.jyutping: daai6 bou6 fan6 hoeng1 gong2 ge3 ci3 so2 seoi2 hai6 haam4 seoi2 lei4.
examples.translation: Seawater is widely used in Hong Kong for toilet flushing.

senses.definition: （正式場合）用嚟數地方、或者某啲部位 ((formal) counting places or some parts)
senses.label: 量詞

examples.jyutping: gok3 cyu3 hoeng1 cyun1 gok3 cyu3 lai6
examples.translation: Every village has its own rules.

senses.definition: 生水皰、暗瘡之類 (to have pimples or blisters)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.text: 我食咗好多炸雞，搞到塊面係咁出痘。
examples.translation: I broke out in pimples on my face after consuming a lot of fried chickens.

senses.definition: 超乎常人嘅能力 (supernatural power)
senses.label: 名詞

senses.definition: 地區名；位於#中國 西南部嘅省份，簡稱「青」；省會係#西寧 (Qinghai; Tsinghai; Kokonor)
senses.label: 名詞

senses.definition: 做一啲其他人唔容許嘅嘢，損害對方嘅權益 (to infringe; to violate; to intrude)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.jyutping: cam1 faan6 baan2 kyun4
examples.translation: to infringe the copyright

senses.definition: 用舉重同對抗阻力嘅運動達到健身嘅效果 (weight training)
senses.label: 名詞

senses.definition: 將已經廣播過嘅節目再廣播 (to re-broadcast; to rerun)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.text: 呢間電視台啲節目不停重播。
examples.jyutping: ni1 gaan1 din6 si6 toi4 di1 zit3 muk6 bat1 ting4 cung4 bo3.
examples.translation: This TV station keeps re-broadcasting its programmes all the time.

senses.definition: 重新回顧、想起 (to relive; to review; to recall)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.jyutping: din6 si6 zit3 muk6 cung4 wan1
examples.translation: TV programme rerun

senses.definition: 一啲擺起咗，唔係即時要用，而係以備不時之需嘅資源，例如#錢、#糧食 或者#石油（量詞：筆／項） (reserve; stockpile)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.jyutping: coi4 zing3 cyu5 bei6
examples.translation: financial reserves

senses.definition: 委婉咁形容人瘦咗；或因病而消瘦咗 (thin, slight, lean)
senses.label: 形容詞

examples.text: 佢做完化療之後，成個人清瘦咗好多。
examples.translation: She looks much thinner after she completed the chemotherapy.

senses.definition: 令人或者動物增加性欲 (to promote a human's or an animal's sexual desire, usually with medicines)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.jyutping: ceoi1 cing4 joek6
examples.translation: aphrodisiac

senses.definition: 形容一對戀人經常糖痴豆咁；形影不離 (to be very clingy with their lovers)
senses.label: 形容詞

examples.text: 佢男友真係好癡纏，每分每秒都想同佢喺埋一齊。
examples.translation: Her boyfriend is super clingy; he wants to spend every second with her.

senses.definition: 一種最早作為西藥用嘅#抗生素 (penicillin)
senses.label: 名詞

senses.definition: 好多人認為某一樣嘢好好 (popular)
senses.label: 形容詞

examples.text: 今季潮流興著長裙，買條啦。
examples.jyutping: gam1 gwai3 ciu4 lau4 hing1 zoek3 coeng4 kwan4, maai5 tiu4 laa1.
examples.translation: Long dresses are very popular in this season. Just buy one.

senses.definition: 退咗休嘅人（尤其係#公務員）嘅退休金（量詞：份） (pension, especially of a civil servant; literally: long grain)
senses.label: 名詞

senses.definition: 用#衣車#縫製 衣服 (to make clothes with a sewing machine)

senses.definition: 用#衣車#縫製 衣服 (to make clothes with a sewing machine)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.translation: After she immigrated, she made clothes with sewing machine in the little factories in China town.

senses.definition: 同#主句 相對，以內嵌或者依附形式存在喺句子入面嘅小句 (subordinate clause)

senses.definition: 茶（奉茶、飲茶）嘅禮儀 (tea ceremonies)

senses.definition: 茶嘅禮品，通常用嚟借代#聘禮 (literally tea gifts, usually used to refer to wedding gift to the bride's family (as tea is a must-have))

examples.jyutping: sau1 loeng5 gaa1 caa4 lai5
examples.translation: to benefit from two sides by cheating; literally, to eat tea gifts from two families

senses.definition: 好似俾針拮到噉#痛 法（量詞：陣） (stabbing pain)

senses.definition: 城市名，位於#中國#廣東 省東部，廣義亦都可以指成個#潮汕 地區，大部份居民講#潮州話 (Chaozhou; Teochew; Chiu Chow)

examples.jyutping: ciu4 zau1 waa2
examples.translation: Teochew language

senses.definition: 一套源自日本嘅電子遊戲系列。以及同作品登場嘅虛構生物名、及以之為題材嘅衍生作品群。 (Pokemon)

senses.definition: 上一世冇積福積陰德，或者做過壞事，令今世有因果報應 (sin from one's past life)

senses.definition: 同一個人#結婚 之後，冇離婚就同另一個人結婚；喺香港係犯法嘅 (bigamy)
senses.label: 動詞

senses.definition: 壓成餅狀嘅茶葉 (tea disc)
senses.label: 名詞

senses.definition: 英人用作茶點之餅食 (tea biscuit)
賽事嘅形勢、情況 (situation in a competition/race/match)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.jyutping: sai3 gaai3 bui1 coi3 fong3 bou3 dou6

senses.definition: 加插喺書本或文章入面，用嚟幫助解釋事物嘅圖片（量詞：幅／張） (illustration in a book or an article)

senses.definition: 將食物切成方塊狀 (to dice; to cut something (typically food) into small cubes)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.text: 你有冇十五分鐘時間啊？幫我將啲雞肉切丁吖。

examples.text: 你可唔可以將嗰次罪案嘅發生過程詳述出嚟？
examples.translation: Can you elaborate on how the crime took place?

senses.definition: 好過一般人，顯得突出 (oustanding)

examples.jyutping: ni1 go3 tin1 coi4 ji4 tung4 zi3 soeng1 ciu1 kwan4.

senses.definition: 畀人派去#暗殺 某啲目標嘅人 (assassin)

examples.text: 刺客通常都好叻喬裝同埋混入人群呢啲技巧。
examples.jyutping: ci3 haak3 tung1 soeng4 dou1 hou2 lek1 kiu4 zong1 tung4 maai4 wan6 jap6 jan4 kwan4 ni1 di1 gei6 haau2.

senses.definition: 一個群體嘅全部 (entirety; whole)

examples.jyutping: cyun4 tai2 tung4 hok6 suk1 zing6!
examples.translation: All students must keep quiet.

senses.definition: 極為優秀；喺一群人中非常顯眼突出 (outstanding; extraordinary; standing out from the crowd)

examples.jyutping: keoi5 coi4 maau6 ceot1 zung3, jau5 hou2 do1 neoi5 zai2 zung1 ji3.

senses.definition: 好多人爭住去一個地方或者爭住去做一件事，好似成群鴨跑過去咁 (used to describe a lot of people scrambling or rushing for something (like a flock of ducks))

examples.text: 嗰間百貨公司大減價，好多人都趨之若鶩。
examples.jyutping: go2 gaan1 baak3 fo3 gung1 si1 daai6 gaam2 gaa3, hou2 do1 jan4 dou1 ceoi1 zi1 joek6 mou6.
examples.translation: That department store is having a sale and people are flocking for it.

senses.definition: 鹹水魚，魚身好似刀咁修長，肉質嚡（量詞：條） (Pacific saury; saira)

examples.text: 呢間位於西營盤嘅電器維修舖，#店長 添爺係一隻白色松鼠狗
examples.translation: The 'owner' of this electrical appliance repairing shop Don Tim is a white Pomeranian.

senses.definition: #茶壺 倒茶出嚟嘅開口（量詞：個） (mouth of a teapot)
senses.label: 名詞

senses.definition: #唱片 嘅播放器（量詞：個/架） (record player)

senses.definition: 無孔貽貝類嘅統稱（見#蜆)，有啡色、紫藍色嘅殼，同#蠔 類似，會黐住石頭、船底生長 (mussel)

examples.jyutping: baak6 zau2 zyu2 ceng1 hau2
examples.translation: mussels with wine

senses.definition: 泛指刺激人眼淚腺嘅化學武器，可以令人暫時失去行動力；警察好多時都會攞嚟驅趕示威者 (tear gas)

senses.definition: 裝喺窗框上嘅欄柵，以作防盜或者防止下墮。又稱做防盜窗。（量詞：個） (window grille)

examples.text: 屋企有細路仔一定要安窗花以策安全啊。
examples.translation: For children's safety at home, window grilles should be installed.

senses.definition: 四周圍去檢查一啲嘢；通常係政府部門做嘅，會睇下目標有冇違反相應嘅條例 (to check; to inspect)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.text: 上個月衞生福利及食物局巡查咗好多茶餐廳，發現其中兩成唔合乎衞生標準。
examples.jyutping: soeng6 go3 jyut6 wai6 sang1 fuk1 lei6 kap6 sik6 mat6 guk6 ceon4 caa4 zo2 hou2 do1 caa4 caan1 teng1, faat3 jin6 kei4 zung1 loeng5 sing4 m4 hap6 fu4 wai6 sang1 biu1 zeon2.
examples.translation: The Health, Welfare and Food Bureau inspected a number of Hong Kong-style cafés and found that twenty percent of them did not meet hygiene standards.

senses.definition: 香港舊十蚊紙幣嘅俗稱，已於1994年停止發行，因為用綠色作為主色，所以被稱為「青蟹」 (old $10 Hong Kong note, stopped issuing in 1994; as the main color is green, it is called "Green Crab")

examples.jyutping: ngo5 deoi3 tou4 syu1 gun2 hok6 zi2 jau5 cou1 cin2 ge3 liu5 gaai2.

senses.definition: 超級#必殺技 嘅簡稱，即係#超#勁 嘅必殺技 (super strong attack; ultimate attack)

senses.definition: 水平低少少、次一級 (a bit worse)

senses.definition: 新潮、喺潮流嘅最尖端 (trendy; up-to-date; avant-garde)

senses.definition: #懲教署 轄下嘅#監獄 設施 (correctional institution)

senses.definition: 意思完整又能夠獨立使用嘅語言單位，由#語素 組成，又或者係單個自由語素；#詞語（量詞：個／隻） (word; term; either a meaningful group of morphemes or a single free morpheme)

examples.jyutping: tung4 ji6 ci4
examples.translation: synonym

senses.definition: 華文文學體裁之一，又叫長短句，有格律，押韻；本身係依照曲譜（#詞牌）嚟填，後來脱離咗旋律；起於唐，興於宋（量詞：首／篇／闋） (ci; classical Chinese verse; rhyming "long and short lines")
#歌詞（量詞：篇／份／首） (lyrics)

examples.jyutping: ngo5 bei2 ni1 pin1 ci4 daa2 dung6 zo2.
examples.translation: I was moved by this piece of lyrics.

senses.label: 名詞

examples.text: 西炒飯、揚州炒飯、福建炒飯，咁多種炒飯，我都唔知邊隻打邊隻。
examples.jyutping: sai1 caau2 faan6, joeng4 zau1 caau2 faan6, fuk1 gin3 caau2 faan6, gam3 do1 zung2 caau2 faan6, ngo5 dou1 m4 zi1 bin1 zek3 daa2 bin1 zek3.
examples.translation: Western-style fried rice, Yeung Chow fried rice, Hokkien fried rice, there are so many different kinds of fried rice. I can't distinguish them.

senses.definition: 擁有嘅金錢同物品 (one's money and property; belongings)

examples.text: 請好好保管自己嘅財物，提防扒手。
examples.jyutping: cing2 hou2 hou2 bou2 gun2 zi6 gei2 ge3 coi4 mat6, tai4 fong4 paa4 sau2.

senses.definition: 即係#差啲；好接近；爭少少 (nearly; almost)

examples.jyutping: ngo5 caa1 di1 zing2 m4 gin3 go3 ngan4 baau1.
examples.translation: I almost lost my wallet.

senses.definition: 即係牛、馬、羊、雞、狗、豬等六畜，亦都可以係動物嘅總稱（量詞：隻） (livestock; domestic animal)
senses.label: 名詞

senses.definition: 好似#禽獸 噉，比喻一啲品行差劣嘅人（量詞：個／隻） (a derogative term for those that are inhuman, like #禽獸 kam4sau3)

examples.text: 你個畜牲！竟然攞晒阿媽啲錢去賭？
examples.jyutping: nei5 go3 cuk1 sang1! ging2 jin4 lo2 saai3 aa3 maa1 di1 cin2 heoi3 dou2?

senses.definition: 驚訝，覺得奇怪 (amazed; surprised; astonished)

examples.text: 佢咁靚女，多人追冇咩好詫異啫。
examples.jyutping: keoi5 gam3 leng3 neoi2, do1 jan4 zeoi1 mou5 me1 hou2 caa3 ji6 ze1.
examples.translation: She's quite pretty, you don't have to be so surprised that she's got many admirers.

senses.definition: 將某樣嘢換成另一樣嘢，發揮同樣或類似嘅功能，原本嗰樣嘢唔要 (to replace; to supersede; to supplant)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.text: 呢個全自動系統將會取替舊嘅系統。
examples.jyutping: ni1 go3 cyun4 zi6 dung6 hai6 tung2 zoeng1 wui5 ceoi2 tai3 gau6 ge3 hai6 tung2.
examples.translation: This fully-automatic system will replace the old one.

senses.definition: 東亞習俗；大肚婆生完#BB 之後休養一個月，以調養身體；飲食、個人清潔、室內通風等都需要注意，例如會食#豬腳薑 等補品 (a tradition in East Asia which pregnant women stay at home and rest for a month after labour)
senses.label: 動詞

senses.definition: 細細薄薄嘅書仔，通常用嚟介紹某方面嘅資料 (booklet; pamphlet; brochure; a small, thin book used usually for introduction of a certain topic)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.jyutping: gung1 si1 gaan2 gaai3 caak3 zi2
examples.translation: brochure

senses.definition: #奢侈#華麗，形容質素、格調極高，亦暗示相應花費亦高。含貶義。 (luxurious; extravagant)
senses.label: 形容詞

examples.jyutping: ce1 waa4 ge3 sang1 wut6
examples.translation: extravagant lifestyle

senses.definition: 不停喺對方身邊，煩住對方 (to keep annoying someone; to stay around someone)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.text: 隻貓成日纏住佢，唔俾佢做嘢。
examples.jyutping: zek3 maau1 sing4 jat6 cin4 zyu6 keoi5, m4 bei2 keoi5 zou6 je5.
examples.translation: The cat keeps annoying him and prevents him from working.

senses.definition: #䱽魚 (pampus)
senses.label: 名詞

senses.definition: （有權勢嘅人）幫住某人，令佢唔驚其他人 ((someone with power) to back somebody up; literally, to support one's waist)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.text: 個孫成日有嫲嫲幫佢撐腰，搞到而家成日唔聽父母話。
examples.jyutping: go3 syun1 seng4 jat6 jau5 maa4 maa4 bong1 keoi5 caang1 jiu1, gaau2 dou3 ji4 gaa1 seng4 jat6 m4 teng1 fu6 mou5 waa6.
examples.translation: The grandchild always has his grandma to back him up, turns out he barely listens to his parents now.

senses.definition: 相對小型嘅#鎚，通常係一隻手就可以揸起同運用嘅（量詞：個） (hammer)
senses.label: 名詞

senses.definition: 一種拉力強又薄嘅透明紙（量詞：張） (onion skin paper)
senses.label: 名詞

senses.definition: 真心、誠心 (sincere)
senses.label: 形容詞

examples.jyutping: cung1 sing4 hap6 zok3
examples.translation: to cooperate sincerely

senses.definition: 正文之前嘅簡介（量詞：篇／段） (foreword)

senses.definition: #木棉 嘅狀態會隨住季節而變，春天開紅花，夏天啲花跌晒落嚟出綠葉，秋天開始落葉，冬天就枯到光禿禿，所以知道木棉生成點，就知道季節氣候嘅變化。 (Cotton tree changes its form in accordance to the four seasons. Red flowers blossom in the spring which is replaced by green leaves in the summer. They fell off by the autumn and the tree is reduced to bare branches by the winter. One knows the seasonal changes by observing the different forms of cotton tree.)
senses.label: 語句

senses.label: 量詞

senses.definition: 本來想#擦鞋，但係討好唔到上司，可能仲激嬲咗佢 (to fail to please one's boss, literally: to shine the wrong shoe)

senses.definition: 因為做咗唔合乎規範或者期望嘅事，而有難堪嘅感覺 (ashamed)

examples.jyutping: keoi5 gaan1 gung1 si1 coi4 lik6 hung4 hau5.
examples.translation: His company has good financial strength.

senses.definition: 指屋或者物件睇落好#舊，有好多需要修補嘅地方 (old and shabby; dilapidated; looking old, with many places needing repair)

examples.text: 呢間屋租過好多手，係殘舊少少㗎喇。

examples.translation: This house is rented by many tenants before, so it is a bit shabby.

senses.definition: 以#飲茶 為主，有售賣#點心 嘅中式（通常指粵式）#食肆（量詞：間） (a (usually Cantonese) Chinese teahouse that serves tea and dim sum)

examples.text: 呢間茶樓啲點心好出名。
examples.jyutping: ni1 gaan1 caa4 lau4 di1 dim2 sam1 hou2 ceot1 meng2.
examples.translation: This restaurant is very famous for their dim sum.

senses.definition: 唔好俾人見到你啲錢，以免有人起貪念打你主意 (don't flaunt your wealth, don't let others see your money; literally: money should not be exposed to the eyes)
senses.label: 語句

senses.definition: 歇後語：花樣隨時變 (former half of a sandwich pun to imply a dazzling variety; literally: the layered costume of the actress who plays the role of the weaver fairy Zhinü)

examples.translation: You damn cunt! Don't let me see your face again.

senses.definition: 即係#狂躁 (easily irritable)

senses.definition: 對其他人個#女 嘅雅稱（量詞：位） (an honorific referring to someone's daughter)

examples.jyutping: ling6 cin1 gam1 hai2 bin1 gaan1 daai6 hok6 duk6 syu1 aa3

senses.definition: 位於女性#陰道 口周圍嘅薄膜；會因為性行為、激烈運動等原因撕裂（量詞：塊／層） (hymen)

examples.jyutping: keoi5 jau4 jau4 haa5 seoi2 dat6 jin4 gaan1 cau1 gan1.

examples.jyutping: ngo5 go3 zai2 sai3 go3 si3 gwo3 jat1 ci3 faat3 siu1 cau1 gan1, hou2 zoi6 daai6 go3 zo2 zau6 mou5 si6.

senses.definition: 國家名；位於#非洲 東南部、#印度洋 西部嘅島國，首都係維多利亞 (Seychelles)

senses.definition: 同其他人夾埋，計劃去做犯法或者唔正當嘅嘢 (to conspire; to plot)

examples.jyutping: keoi5 dei6 cyun3 mau4 ngai6 zou6 man4 gin2.

senses.definition: #大肚婆 嘅#羊膜#破裂，喺#陰道 流出#羊水，一般係生#BB 嘅徵兆 (to break the water, to have rupture of membranes)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.text: 你老婆穿咗羊水呀，我送緊佢去醫院喇。
examples.translation: Your wife's water has broken. I'm sending her to the hospital now.

senses.definition: #分賬 (To work in an enterprise for a share of the profits)

senses.definition: 茶樹嘅葉，或用茶葉沖出嚟嘅飲品；亦可指用各種植物或藥材沖泡而成嘅草本飲料（量詞：杯／壺） (the leaves from Camilla sinensis or the beverage brewed from them; tea; tisane)

Literally: exit ball)

senses.definition: 仁慈、安祥、充滿咗愛；通常攞嚟形容老人家 (benign, gentle, kind, and loving; usually used to describe the elderly)

senses.definition: 「艹」，#部首「艸」做「上#偏旁」嘅寫法（量詞：個） ("艹", the written form for the Kangxi radical "艸" used on the top of a character)

senses.label: 動詞

examples.text: 佢好早返工，每朝都係佢第一個簽到。
examples.jyutping: keoi5 hou2 zou2 faan1 gung1, mui5 ziu1 dou1 hai6 keoi5 dai6 jat1 go3 cim1 dou3.
examples.translation: Going to work very early, he is the first to sign in every morning.

senses.definition: 同#烚下烚下 咁上下意思，但係語氣強烈同粗俗好多 (an obscene expression for extremely stupid; very stupid; "fucking stupid")
senses.label: 形容詞

senses.definition: 僱主畀人工員工；員工拎到人工 ((of employers) to pay salary; (of employees) to receive one's salary)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.jyutping: jyut6 mei5 laa3 wo3, nei5 ceot1 loeng4 mei6 aa3?
examples.translation: It's the end of the month. Have you received your salary yet?

senses.definition: 做好一件事之後得到嘅#額外#金錢 或者#禮物（量詞：份） (extra reward or remuneration)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.text: 作為酬勞，公司送咗間大屋俾佢。
examples.jyutping: zok3 wai4 cau4 lou4, gung1 si1 sung3 zo2 gaan1 daai6 uk1 bei2 keoi5.
examples.translation: The company gave him a big house as a reward.

senses.definition: 同#自殺 (to seek death; to commit suicide)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.jyutping: keoi5 nam2 m4 hoi1, kyut3 ding6 heoi3 cam4 sei2
examples.translation: He couldn't think it through and decided to kill himself.

senses.definition: 每年嘅第七個月；喺西曆入面係大月，有三十一日 (the seventh month of a year; July)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.text: 啲中學生七月就放暑假喇。
examples.jyutping: di1 zung1 hok6 saang1 cat1 jyut6 zau6 fong3 syu2 gaa3 laa3.
examples.translation: Secondary school students have their summer holiday in July.

senses.definition: 唔理安危，冒生命危險，置生死於度外 (to go through fire and water; to go through thick and thin; to do something at the risk of one's life)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.text: 我同你出生入死，你竟然噉對我？
examples.jyutping: ngo5 tung4 nei5 ceot1 sang1 jap6 sei2, nei5 ging2 jin4 gam2 deoi3 ngo5?
examples.translation: I risked my life for you, but you treat me like that?

senses.definition: 一種法律程序，指公司停止生產運作，所有資產要喺短期內出售，變返現金，按先後次序償還債項，然後按法律程序宣布公司解散 (to liquidate)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.text: 佢間公司俾人清咗盤，仲爭落一身債。
examples.jyutping: keoi5 gaan1 gung1 si1 bei2 jan4 cing1 zo2 pun2, zung6 zaang1 lok6 jat1 san1 zaai3.
examples.translation: His company was liquidated, and he is also deeply in debt.

senses.definition: 本身指#脷根 過短影響#發音；實際上多數指讀唔到噝音（si1 jam1，例如「沙」「渣」「叉」嘅聲母）呢種語言#障礙 (to suffer from tongue tie; to speak with a lisp)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.text: 佢講嘢黐脷根，我唔係咁聽得明佢講乜。
examples.jyutping: keoi5 gong2 je5 ci1 lei6 gan1, ngo5 m4 hai6 gam3 teng1 dak1 ming4 keoi5 gong2 mat1.
examples.translation: He speaks with a lisp. I can't quite make out what he was trying to say.

senses.definition: 有多到#無窮無盡 嘅變化 (ever-changing; changing constantly; with much variation)
senses.label: 語句

examples.text: 呢個世界千變萬化，冇人知道聽日會發生乜嘢事。
examples.jyutping: ni1 go3 sai3 gaai3 cin1 bin3 maan6 faa3, mou5 jan4 zi1 dou6 ting1 jat6 wui5 faat3 sang1 mat1 je5 si6.
examples.translation: The world is changing constantly, no one knows what will happen tomorrow.

senses.definition: 私人之間嘅#交情、#面子 (the relationship between the parties and one's face)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.jyutping: bat1 gu3 cing4 min2
examples.translation: to disregard the relationship and one's face

senses.definition: 解散隊伍；結束合作關係 (to dissolve a partnership; to end the co-operation)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.text: 佢哋合作咗三年之後就拆夥喇。
examples.jyutping: keoi5 dei6 hap6 zok3 zo2 saam1 nin4 zi1 hau6 zau6 caak3 fo2 laa3.
examples.translation: They have dissolved their partnership after three years of co-operation.

senses.definition: 重新寫過 (to rewrite; to write the whole again)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.text: 文章唔符合要求，要重寫。
examples.jyutping: man2 zoeng1 m4 fu4 hap6 jiu1 kau4, jiu3 cung4 se2.
examples.translation: The article does not fit the requirements and needs rewriting.

senses.definition: 天資好，理解能力高，智力高於平均水平 (intelligent; clever; smart)
senses.label: 形容詞

examples.text: 呢個細路好聰明，一教就識。
examples.jyutping: ni1 go3 sai3 lou6 hou2 cung1 ming4, jat1 gaau3 zau6 sik1.
examples.translation: This child is smart. Whatever I teach him, he understands immediately.

senses.definition: 附有訊息，用嚟做宣傳嘅小型紙張（量詞：張／沓） (leaflet; handbill; flyer)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.jyutping: paai3 cyun4 daan1
examples.translation: to distribute flyers

senses.definition: #後生 而有#活力 (youthful and energetic)
senses.label: 形容詞

examples.text: 佢雖然已經六十歲，但係睇落仲好青春。
examples.jyutping: keoi5 seoi1 jin4 ji5 ging1 luk6 sap6 seoi3, daan6 hai6 tai2 lok6 zung6 hou2 cing1 ceon1.
examples.translation: Although she's already sixty, she looks youthful.

senses.definition: #後生，仲係好有#活力 嘅時光 (youthfulness; youth)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.text: 一個人嘅青春好有限㗎咋。
examples.jyutping: jat1 go3 jan4 ge3 cing1 ceon1 hou2 jau5 haan6 gaa3 zaa3.
examples.translation: One's youth is very limited.

senses.definition: 令某人或物表露本質 (to expose; to reveal; to unmask)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.jyutping: caak3 cyun1 pin3 guk6
examples.translation: to expose a fraud

senses.definition: 形容年輕男性外表好睇，皮膚白皙 ((of young men)young and good-looking, often having a light skin colour; literally: light green, pretty, white, clean)
senses.label: 語句

examples.text: 呢個新晉歌手青靚白淨，吸引到唔少女歌迷。
examples.jyutping: ni1 go3 san1 zeon3 go1 sau2 ceng1 leng3 baak6 zeng6, kap1 jan5 dou2 m4 siu2 neoi5 go1 mai4.
examples.translation: This new singer looks so good-looking and attracts quite a number of female fans.

senses.definition: 故意做某啲行為吸引人注意自己 (to steal the limelight; to show off; to attract attention to oneself)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.text: 佢最鍾意喺佢啲朋友面前出風頭。
examples.jyutping: keoi5 zeoi3 zung1 ji3 hai2 keoi5 di1 pang4 jau5 min6 cin4 ceot1 fung1 tau4.
examples.translation: He likes to show off in front of his friends the most.

senses.definition: 某事或物產生出嚟嘅嘢，可以指實物或抽象概念（量詞：件） (product; outcome; can refer to both real-life entities or abstract concepts)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.text: 副學士係教育商品化嘅產物。
examples.translation: Associate degrees are a product of the commoditization of education.

senses.definition: #地球 嘅七個#大陸，包括#亞洲、#歐洲、#非洲、#北美洲、#南美洲、#大洋洲 同#南極洲 (seven continents of the world)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.jyutping: ng5 daai6 joeng4 cat1 daai6 zau1
examples.translation: the seven continents and the five oceans

senses.definition: 唔經刪減嘅完整文字 (unabridged text; the whole passage)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.jyutping: gam6 jap6 heoi3 tai2 cyun4 man4.
examples.translation: Click to see the whole passage.

senses.definition: 成個旅程 (the whole journey)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.text: 我哋喺車上面全程都冇瞓過。
examples.jyutping: ngo5 dei6 hai2 ce1 soeng6 min6 cyun4 cing4 dou1 mou5 fan3 gwo3.
examples.translation: We haven't slept in the car for the whole journey.

senses.definition: 成個過程 (the whole process)

examples.text: 今晚餐飯佢全程都冇笑過。
examples.jyutping: gam1 maan5 caan1 faan6 keoi5 cyun4 cing4 dou1 mou5 siu3 gwo3.
examples.translation: She didn't smile throughout the dinner tonight.

senses.definition: 同#愛情 有關嘅#歌曲（量詞：首／支／隻） (love song; a song related to romantic relationships)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.jyutping: coeng3 cing4 go1
examples.translation: to sing a love song

senses.definition: 新年前一日；一年嘅最後一日（量詞：個） (New Year's Eve)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.text: 今年除夕佢會同朋友去倒數。
examples.jyutping: gam1 nin2 ceoi4 zik6 keoi5 wui5 tung4 pang4 jau5 heoi3 dou3 sou2.
examples.translation: He will meet up his friends for the countdown this new year's eve.

senses.definition: 將一啲液狀或膏狀嘅嘢放喺手或器具上，然後放上一樣嘢嘅表面，由一個點拖去另一點 (to put on; to apply; to smear; to spread; usually with respect to creams, lotions, or thick liquids)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.jyutping: caa4 seon4 gou1
examples.translation: to put on lipstick

senses.definition: 程度嚴重到一個好淒慘、好災難性嘅地步 (tragic and disastrous; catastrophic)
senses.label: 形容詞

examples.jyutping: gam1 ci3 ji3 ngoi6 sei2 soeng1 hou2 caam2 lit6.
examples.translation: This accident has a tragically high number of casualties.

senses.definition: 冇十足把握嘅#推測 或#估計（量詞：個） (speculation; guess)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.text: 你嘅猜想其實毫無根據。
examples.translation: There is no evidence for your speculations.

senses.definition: 數學上，估計係啱但係未證實到，亦都未俾人推翻嘅假設（量詞：個） (conjecture)
整體，通常指複雜嘅計劃或者計謀 (all; overall)
senses.label: 區別詞

examples.jyutping: cyun4 pun4 gai3 waak6
examples.translation: overall plan

senses.definition: 追求同一個目標；有同一個理想 (of one mind, of one heart, to pursue some goal together)
senses.label: 形容詞

examples.text: 政府呼籲市民齊心合力預防蚊患。
examples.jyutping: zing3 fu2 fu1 jyu6 si5 man4 cai4 sam1 hap6 lik6 jyu6 fong4 man1 waan6.
examples.translation: The government called on us to prevent mosquito problems together.

senses.definition: 瞓覺時因為呼吸受阻，令呼吸道結構嘅軟組織振動而發出聲音；通常喺睡眠不足或者有睡眠窒息症時發生，當事人一般都唔知道同埋控制唔到 (to snore)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.text: 佢成晚喺度扯鼻鼾，搞到我瞓唔着。
examples.jyutping: keoi5 seng4 maan5 hai2 dou6 ce2 bei6 hon4, gaau2 dou3 ngo5 fan3 m4 zoek6.
examples.translation: He was snoring all night and I couldn't fall to sleep.

senses.definition: 就嚟生得（#待產）嘅#孕婦（量詞：個） (expectant mother)
senses.label: 名詞

senses.definition: 籌錢去達到特定目的 (to raise fund for a specific purpose)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.jyutping: ngo5 dei6 nam2 zyu6 cau4 kei4 dang1 bou3.
examples.translation: We are planning to raise money to place a newspaper advertisement.

senses.definition: 流傳好耐，一直咁俾人記住 (to be commemorated; to be memorialized)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.jyutping: hou6 hei3 coeng4 cyun4
examples.translation: the spirit lives on

senses.definition: 一種工藝；利用針線，喺布上面縫上花樣圖案（量詞：件／幅） (embroidery)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.text: 而家好少人識得刺繡喇。
examples.jyutping: ji4 gaa1 hou2 siu2 jan4 sik1 dak1 ci3 sau3 laa3.
examples.translation: Few people know how to do embroidery nowadays.

senses.definition: 邀請其他人食飯，又或者一齊食完飯之後幫人畀錢 (to invite or treat somebody to a meal; to pay for a meal)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.text: 唔好攞錢出嚟，呢餐我請客。
examples.jyutping: m4 hou2 lo2 cin2 ceot1 lai4, ni1 caan1 ngo5 ceng2 haak3.
examples.translation: Don't take your wallet out, this meal is on me.

senses.definition: 懷孕女性喺#分娩 前後向公司#請 嘅#假（量詞：日） (maternity leave)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.jyutping: fong3 caan2 gaa3
examples.translation: to be on maternity leave

senses.definition: 由頭到尾；夾埋；總共 (from start to finish; in total)
senses.label: 副詞

examples.text: 呢項工程由動工到完工，前後用咗五年時間。
examples.jyutping: ni1 hong6 gung1 cing4 jau5 dung6 gung1 dou3 jyun4 gung1, cin4 hau6 jung6 zo2 ng5 nin4 si4 gaan3.
examples.translation: From the beginning of construction to its completion, this project took five years in total.

senses.definition: 指一樣嘢好有創意，或者係重大嘅突破，從來冇人諗到或者做過；下句係「#後無來者」 (unprecedented; pioneering)
senses.label: 語句

senses.definition: 一夫多妻制底下，地位低過正室、平室嘅女配偶（量詞：個） (concubine)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.text: 喺中國嘅舊社會，男人可以娶妾侍。
examples.jyutping: hai2 zung1 gwok3 ge3 gau6 se5 wui2, naam4 jan2 ho2 ji5 ceoi2 cip3 si6.
examples.translation: In the ancient Chinese society, men could marry concubines.

senses.definition: 自己去做，而唔係叫其他人去做 (personally; with one's own hands)
senses.label: 副詞

examples.text: 個生日蛋糕係我親手整㗎。
examples.jyutping: go3 saang1 jat6 daan6 gou1 hai6 ngo5 can1 sau2 zing2 gaa3.
examples.translation: I made this birthday cake on my own.

senses.definition: 把握、利用機會 (taking the advantage of an opportunity)
senses.label: 副詞

examples.text: 媽咪一出去，佢就趁機玩電腦。
examples.jyutping: maa1 mi4 jat1 ceot1 heoi3, keoi5 zau6 can3 gei1 waan2 din6 nou5.
examples.translation: Once mum went out, he immediately took the opportunity to play computer games.

senses.definition: 一隻檸檬味嘅汽水牌子 ("7 Up", a brand of lemon-lime flavoured soft drink)
senses.label: 名詞

senses.definition: 被普遍認為係道德或法律上錯誤，並因而引起公眾輿論同憤怒嘅事件（量詞：件／單） (scandal)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.jyutping: zing3 zi6 cau2 man4
examples.translation: political scandal

senses.definition: 從眾多嘅事物中抽取出共同嘅、本質性嘅特徵，而捨棄啲非本質嘅特徵；唔具體 (abstract, not concrete)
senses.label: 形容詞

examples.jyutping: cau1 zoeng6 waa2
examples.translation: abstract painting

senses.definition: 差唔多完成；字面解做咗七、八成嘅嘢 (nearly all; almost complete; seventy to eighty percent; literally: seven seven eight eight)
senses.label: 形容詞

examples.text: 份報告都做得七七八八喇。
examples.jyutping: fan6 bou3 gou3 dou1 zou6 dak1 cat1 cat1 baat3 baat3 laa3.
examples.translation: The report is almost complete.

senses.definition: 好耐以前 (quite a long time ago)
senses.label: 語句

examples.text: 我曾幾何時都係運動健將嚟㗎，不過而家都老到唔郁得嘍。
examples.jyutping: ngo5 cang4 gei2 ho4 si4 dou1 hai6 wan6 dung6 gin6 zoeng3 lai4 gaa3, bat1 gwo3 ji4 gaa1 dou1 lou5 dou3 m4 juk1 dak1 lo3.
examples.translation: I was a good sportsman quite a long time ago, but now I am so old that I can't even move.

senses.definition: 非常之慘、可憐 (woeful; miserable)
senses.label: 形容詞

examples.jyutping: keoi5 haam3 dak1 hou2 cai1 loeng4 aa3.
examples.translation: She is crying very woefully.

senses.definition: 幼細嘅灰土 (dust; very fine grey earth)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.jyutping: can4 tou2 fei1 joeng4
examples.translation: dust flying around

senses.definition: 比喻世間嘅事情 (metaphor for worldly things)
升旗嘅其中一種方法 (a method of raising flags)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.jyutping: ce2 kei4 saan1
examples.translation: another name for the Victoria Peak; literally, raise-flag hill

senses.definition: #橙 嘅果肉#榨 出嚟飲用嘅液體，亦都指帶橙味嘅飲品 (orange juice)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.jyutping: sin1 zaa3 caang2 zap1
examples.translation: freshly squeezed orange juice

senses.definition: 可以增強#性慾 嘅#藥 (medicine which improves sexual desire; aphrodisiac)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.text: 你食咗春藥呀，今日咁鬼鹹濕嘅？
examples.jyutping: nei5 sik6 zo2 ceon1 joek6 aa4, gam1 jat6 gam3 gwai2 haam4 sap1 ge2?
examples.translation: Have you taken an aphrodisiac today? You acted so horny!

senses.definition: #四季；#春天、#夏天、#秋天 同#冬天 (the four seasons; literally, spring, summer, autumn, winter)
senses.label: 名詞

senses.definition: 因為做咗啲尷尬或者愚蠢嘅事而冇面 (to make a fool of oneself; to expose oneself to ridicule)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.text: 你都唔識唱歌，參加歌唱比賽盞出醜。
examples.jyutping: nei5 dou1 m4 sik1 coeng3 go1, caam1 gaa1 go1 coeng3 bei2 coi3 zaan2 ceot1 cau2.
examples.translation: You can't sing! To join the singing contest is to make a fool of yourself.

senses.definition: 以天然磁鐵礦加工製成，或者以鋼、合金鋼磁化後製成嘅磁體；有吸引鐵、鈷、鎳等金屬嘅性質（量詞：嚿／塊） (magnet)
senses.label: 名詞

senses.definition: 向愛慕對象或者戀人表達愛意嘅書信（量詞：封） (love letter)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.text: 佢寄咗封情信比喺外國嘅女友。
examples.jyutping: keoi5 gei3 zo2 fung1 cing4 seon3 bei2 hai2 ngoi6 gwok3 ge3 neoi5 jau5.
examples.translation: He sent a love letter to his girlfriend who went abroad.

senses.definition: 大型嘅零售商店，類似#士多 或者#雜貨舖，但規模大啲；通常以賣食物、日用品同家居用品為主（量詞：間） (supermarket)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.text: 你去開超級市場，順便幫我買包米吖。
examples.jyutping: nei5 heoi3 hoi1 ciu1 kap1 si5 coeng4, seon6 bin2 bong1 ngo5 maai5 baau1 mai5 aa1.
examples.translation: When you go to the supermarket, can you do me a favour and buy a pack of rice for me?

senses.definition: 量度輕重 (to weigh something with a steelyard; to put something on the scales)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.text: 唔該秤下呢條魚有幾重吖？
examples.jyutping: m4 goi1 cing3 haa5 ni1 tiu4 jyu2 jau5 gei2 cung5 aa1?
examples.translation: Can you weigh this fish please?

senses.definition: 一種運用槓桿原理量度物體重量嘅器具（量詞：個／把） (steelyard balance; Roman balance)
senses.label: 名詞

senses.definition: 講；喺正式場合用嚟覆述人哋嘅講法 (to say; used in formal context to report others' speech)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.text: 消息人士稱，股市將會出現輕微波動。
examples.jyutping: siu1 sik1 jan4 si6 cing1, gu2 si5 zoeng1 wui5 ceot1 jin6 hing1 mei4 bo1 dung6.
examples.translation: Sources said that there would be slight undulation in the stock market.

senses.definition: 鳥類、昆蟲或者其他動物住嘅地方；引申指敵人、賊人藏身嘅地方（量詞：個） (nest and cave; places for enemies or thieves to hide; hideout)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.text: 飛虎隊小心翼翼噉接近敵人嘅巢穴。
examples.jyutping: fei1 fu2 deoi2 siu2 sam1 jik6 jik6 gam2 zip3 gan6 dik6 jan4 ge3 caau4 jyut6.
examples.translation: The Flying Tigers carefully approaches their enemies' hideout.

senses.definition: 地支嘅第二位，詳情見#天干地支。 (The first of the Earthly Branches. See #天干地支.)
senses.label: 名詞

senses.definition: 時辰名；夜晚一點到三點 (the second Chinese hour, from 1am to 3am)

senses.definition: #三蛇 即係指#金腳帶、#飯鏟頭 同#過樹榕，三者合一煲#蛇羹 有驅風健步之用。秋天啲蛇會食到肥肥白白準備冬眠，亦都係劏蛇嘅好時機。 (Literally 'when autumn wind blows, the three snakes fatten'. #三蛇 saam1 se4 'three snakes' is a collective term for the banded krait, the Chinese cobra, and the Chinese rat snake, which are common ingredients for snake stew. examples.translation: He assigned a job to me.

senses.definition: 工作；職業（量詞：份） (job; work)

examples.text: 我逼佢讀書，都係想佢第時有份好差事啫。
examples.translation: I force him to study, just because I want him to have a good job in the future.

senses.definition: 為調查或得知某事而詢問 (to interrogate; to inquire about something)
senses.label: 動詞

senses.definition: 原指山脈、道路分岐嘅地方，引伸指由一條線支開變成數條線嗰個分岐嘅地方。 (turnoff; originally referring to where a main road branches into a few roads, now applies to wherever a string/line/lane branches into a few.)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.translation: to have split-ends

senses.definition: 字面解延展出多個分支，又引伸為談話中轉移話題，偏離咗原本嘅主題。 ((lit.) to branch out; (fig.) (of conversation topics) to change; to divert from the original topic)

examples.translation: The road branches out into three.

senses.definition: 事情中冇預計到嘅差池、差錯；亂子 (The unexpected accidents in an event; trouble)
兩個數目之間嘅差距；兩個數入面，大啲嗰個減細啲嗰個得出嚟嘅數。（量詞：個） (difference in number; the amount computed after deducting the smaller number from the larger one.)
senses.label: 名詞
